translation.en: This is your lunch, okay?
translation.zh: 这是你的午餐

translation.en: Now, I put a dollar in there so you can buy some milk. You can ask one of the big kids where to do that.
translation.zh: 我放了一块钱给你买牛奶 问问高年级生在哪里买

translation.en: You remember your phone number? I wrote it down for you, just in case. Put it in your pocket, I don't want you to lose it.
translation.zh: 记得你的电话号码吗？ 我帮你写下来了 别搞丢

translation.en: Okay? You ready? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 没问题吧？准备好了吗？

translation.en: I think so.
translation.zh: 应该是吧

translation.en: It's Cady's big day.
translation.zh: 今天是凯蒂的大日子

translation.en: [Cady] I guess it's natural for parents to cry on their kid's first day of school.
translation.zh: 父母在第一天送孩子去上学时 会哭是很正常的

translation.en: But, you know, this usually happens when the kid is five.
translation.zh: 但那通常是在孩子只有五岁大时

translation.en: I'm 16, and until today, I was home-schooled.
translation.zh: 我已经16岁了 我以前都是在家自学

translation.en: -[shutter clicks] -I know what you're thinking. "Home-schooled kids are freaks."
translation.zh: 你一定以为 在家自学的小孩都是怪胎

translation.en: X-Y-L-O-C-A-R-P.
translation.zh: （全国拼字大赛） X-Y-L-O-C-A-R-P 硬木质果

translation.en: -Xylocarp. -[audience claps]
translation.zh: X-Y-L-O-C-A-R-P 硬木质果

translation.en: [Cady] Or that we're weirdly religious or something.
translation.zh: 要不就是有奇怪的信仰

translation.en: And on the third day, God created the Remington bolt-action rifle
translation.zh: 在第三天 上帝创造了枪栓手动式枪机

translation.en: so that man could fight the dinosaurs. And the homosexuals.
translation.zh: 让我们可以用来对抗恐龙和同性恋

translation.en: [boys] Amen.
translation.zh: 阿们

translation.en: [Cady] But my family's totally normal. Except for the fact that both my parents are research zoologists,
translation.zh: 但我的家人都很正常 只是我父母是动物学家

translation.en: and we've spent the last 12 years in Africa.
translation.zh: 过去12年我们住在非洲

translation.en: I had a great life. But then my mom got offered tenure at Northwestern University.
translation.zh: 我们在那里过得很好 但我妈获得西北大学终身教职

translation.en: So, it was goodbye, Africa, and hello, high school.
translation.zh: 于是我才离开非洲 回到这里来上学

translation.en: I'm okay. Sorry. I'll be careful.
translation.zh: 我没事 对不起 下次我会小心

translation.en: Hi. I don't know if anyone told you about me.
translation.zh: 你好 不知道你有没有听说过 我是新来的学生

translation.en: I'm a new student here. My name is Cady Heron.
translation.zh: 你好 不知道你有没有听说过 我是新来的学生 -我叫凯蒂哈朗 -再跟我讲话我就对你不客气

translation.en: Talk to me again and I'll kick your ass.
translation.zh: -我叫凯蒂哈朗 -再跟我讲话我就对你不客气

translation.en: [Janis] You don't wanna sit there. Kristen Hadley's boyfriend is gonna sit there.
translation.zh: 你不能坐这里 这是克莉丝坦哈雷男友的位子

translation.en: Hey, baby.
translation.zh: 宝贝你好

translation.en: [Janis] Uh-uh. He farts a lot.
translation.zh: 他经常放屁

translation.en: [Ms. Norbury] Hey, everybody.
translation.zh: 大家好

translation.en: [Cady] Oh, God, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 天啊 我很抱歉

translation.en: [Ms. Norbury] It's not you. I'm bad luck.
translation.zh: 不关你的事 是我运气不好

translation.en: -Ms. Norbury? -[students, softly] Ooh!
translation.zh: 诺布里太太

translation.en: [Ms. Norbury] My T-shirt's stuck to my sweater, isn't it? -[Cady] Yeah. -[Ms. Norbury] Fantastic.
translation.zh: 我的Ｔ恤也被拉起来了是不是 真是太好了

translation.en: Is everything all right in here? Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -一切都还好吧？ -对

translation.en: So, uh, how was your summer?
translation.zh: 暑假过得如何？

translation.en: -I got divorced. -Oh.
translation.zh: 我离婚了

translation.en: My carpal tunnel came back. [chuckles softly] I win.
translation.zh: -我的腕道症候群复发了 -我赢了

translation.en: Yes, you do.
translation.zh: 对 你赢了

translation.en: Well, I just wanted to let everyone know that we have a new student joining us.
translation.zh: 我要跟大家宣布 我们有位新学生

translation.en: She just moved here all the way from Africa.
translation.zh: 她刚从非洲回来

translation.en: Welcome.
translation.zh: 欢迎你

translation.en: I'm from Michigan. Great.
translation.zh: -我来自密西根州 -很好

translation.en: Her name is Caddy. Caddy Heron. Where are you, Caddy?
translation.zh: 她的名字叫甘蒂哈朗 甘蒂 你在哪里？

translation.en: That's me. It's pronounced like Katie. [Mr. Duvall] My apologies.
translation.zh: -我在这里 我的名字是凯蒂 -对不起

translation.en: I have a nephew named Anfernee, and I know how mad he gets when I call him Anthony.
translation.zh: 我有个外甥叫安法尼 每次我叫他安东尼他就生气

translation.en: Almost as mad as I get when I think about the fact that my sister named him Anfernee.
translation.zh: 就像当我知道我妹妹 给他取名安法尼时一样生气

translation.en: Well, uh, welcome, Cady. And thank you, Mr. Duvall.
translation.zh: 好 欢迎凯蒂 谢谢你 杜佛先生

translation.en: Well, thank you. And, uh,
translation.zh: 谢谢你 还有…

translation.en: if you need anything, or if you wanna talk to somebody...
translation.zh: 如果你有任何需要 或是想找人谈谈的话…

translation.en: Thanks. Maybe some other time, when my shirt isn't see-through.
translation.zh: 谢谢 等下次我的衣服 没有出状况时再说吧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Okay. Good day, everybody.
translation.zh: 好…祝大家愉快

translation.en: [Cady] The first day of school was a blur. A stressful, surreal blur.
translation.zh: 上学的第一天像置身于迷雾中 一团既紧张又不真实的迷雾

translation.en: I got in trouble for the most random things.
translation.zh: 我被一些小事搞得头昏脑胀

translation.en: Where are you going? Oh, I have to go to the bathroom.
translation.zh: -你要去哪里？ -我要去洗手间

translation.en: You need the lavatory pass. Okay. Can I have the lavatory pass?
translation.zh: -你需要事先请求允许 -好 请允许我去上厕所好吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Nice try. Have a seat.
translation.zh: 说得好 坐下

translation.en: I had never lived in a world where adults didn't trust me, where they were always yelling at me.
translation.zh: 在这个世界 大人不相信我 并对我大吼大叫

translation.en: Don't read ahead! No green pen!
translation.zh: -不要念得比别人快 -不能用绿色的笔

translation.en: No food in class!
translation.zh: 上课不准吃东西

translation.en: [in German] Stay in your assigned seat!
translation.zh: 坐在规定的座位上

translation.en: [boy 1] I told you, I saw the whole thing. -Everything. -[Jason] Did you see nipple?
translation.zh: -我都看到了 -你看到乳头了吗？

translation.en: It only counts if you saw a nipple.
translation.zh: 要看到乳头才算

translation.en: [Cady] I had a lot of friends in Africa.
translation.zh: 我在非洲有很多朋友

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: [Cady] But so far, none in Evanston.
translation.zh: 但在艾凡斯顿则一个也没有

translation.en: Hey. How was your first day?
translation.zh: 上学第一天情况如何？

translation.en: Is that your natural hair color? Yeah.
translation.zh: -这是你本来的发色？ -对

translation.en: It's gorgeous. Thank you.
translation.zh: -很漂亮 -谢谢

translation.en: See, this is the color I want. This is Damian. He's almost too gay to function.
translation.zh: -我就想要这种发色 -达米安太娘娘腔了

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你

translation.en: Nice wig, Janis. What's it made of? Your mom's chest hair!
translation.zh: -不错的假发 是什么做的？ -你妈妈的胸毛

translation.en: I'm Janis. Hi, I'm Cady.
translation.zh: -我是詹妮丝 -你好 我是凯蒂

translation.en: Do you guys know where Room G14 is?
translation.zh: 请问G-14教室怎么走？

translation.en: "Health, Tuesday/Thursday, Room G14."
translation.zh: 健康教育 星期二、四 G-14教室

translation.en: I think that's in the back building.
translation.zh: 我想它在后面那一栋

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's in the back building. Yeah, we'll take you there.
translation.zh: -对 它在后面那栋 -我们会带你去

translation.en: -Thanks. -[bell rings]
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Watch out, please! New meat coming through!
translation.zh: 小心点 新手上路

translation.en: [Damian] "Health. Spanish." You're taking 12th-grade calculus?
translation.zh: 健康教育、西班牙文 你上12年级的微积分？

translation.en: [Cady] Yeah, I like math. Eww, why?
translation.zh: -对 我喜欢数学 -不敢相信 为什么？

translation.en: Because it's the same in every country.
translation.zh: 因为世界各地的数学都一样

translation.en: That's beautiful. This girl is deep.
translation.zh: 很好 这个女孩有深度

translation.en: Where's the back building? It burned down in 1987.
translation.zh: -后栋在哪里？ -它在1987年烧毁了

translation.en: Won't we get in some sort of trouble for this?
translation.zh: 我们这样会不会惹上麻烦？

translation.en: Why would we get you into trouble? We're your friends.
translation.zh: 我们怎么会让你惹上麻烦 我们是朋友

translation.en: [Cady] I know it's wrong to skip class, but Janis said we were friends.
translation.zh: 我知道逃课是不对的 但詹妮丝说我们是朋友

translation.en: And I was in no position to pass up friends. I guess I'll never know what I missed on that first day of health class.
translation.zh: 我绝不会背弃朋友 只是不知道课程内容是什么

translation.en: Don't have sex. Because you will get pregnant and die.
translation.zh: 别发生性行为 否则你会怀孕致死

translation.en: Don't have sex in the missionary position, don't have sex standing up.
translation.zh: 男上女下的不要做 站立式也不要做

translation.en: Just don't do it, promise?
translation.zh: 总之就是不要做 知道了吗？

translation.en: Okay, everybody take some rubbers.
translation.zh: 好 每个人都来拿些保险套

translation.en: Why didn't they just keep home-schooling you? They wanted me to get socialized.
translation.zh: -你为什么不继续在家自学 -爸妈希望我能社会化

translation.en: Oh, you'll get socialized, all right. A little slice like you. What are you talking about?
translation.zh: -你这样的女孩很快会社会化 -你这话是什么意思？

translation.en: You're a regulation hottie.
translation.zh: -你算得上是标准辣妹 -什么？

translation.en: -What? -Own it.
translation.zh: -你算得上是标准辣妹 -什么？ -天生的 -你的名字怎么拼？

translation.en: How do you spell your name again, Caddy?
translation.zh: -天生的 -你的名字怎么拼？

translation.en: It's Cady. C-A-D-Y.
translation.zh: 凯蒂 C、A、D、Y

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna call you "Caddy." In the name of all that is holy, will you look at Karen Smith's gym clothes?
translation.zh: -我会叫你甘蒂 -你看凯伦史密斯的运动服

translation.en: Of course all The Plastics are in the same gym class.
translation.zh: 所有的塑胶一族都上同一堂体育课

translation.en: Who are The Plastics? They're teen royalty.
translation.zh: -谁是塑胶一族？ -学校里的风云人物

translation.en: If North Shore was Us Weekly, they would always be on the cover.
translation.zh: 如果北岸校刊是美国周刊 她们都会是封面女郎

translation.en: [Janis] That one there, that's Karen Smith. She is one of the dumbest girls you will ever meet.
translation.zh: 那是凯伦史密斯 其中最笨的一个女孩

translation.en: Damian sat next to her in English last year. She asked me how to spell "orange."
translation.zh: -达米安去年坐在她旁边 -她还问我桔子怎么拼

translation.en: [Janis] And that little one? That's Gretchen Wieners.
translation.zh: 小个子的那位是葛瑞珍温纳

translation.en: She's totally rich because her dad invented Toaster Strudel.
translation.zh: 她非常有钱 她父亲发明了烤果馅卷

translation.en: Gretchen Wieners knows everybody's business. She knows everything about everyone.
translation.zh: 她知道所有人的秘密 每个人的每件事

translation.en: That's why her hair is so big. It's full of secrets.
translation.zh: 她的头发之所以这么厚 是因为里面藏满了秘密

translation.en: [Janis] And evil takes a human form in Regina George.
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜乔治是魔鬼的化身

translation.en: Don't be fooled, because she may seem like your typical selfish, back-stabbing, slut-faced ho-bag.
translation.zh: 她看起来就像是 会在背后捅你的自私的烂货

translation.en: But in reality, she is so much more than that.
translation.zh: 事实上 她是有过之而无不及

translation.en: [Damian] She's the queen bee. The star. Those other two are just her little workers.
translation.zh: 她是女王蜂 其他人只是她的工蜂

translation.en: [Janis] Regina George. How do I even begin to explain Regina George?
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜乔治 我要如何描述她这个人？

translation.en: Regina George is flawless. She has two Fendi purses and a silver Lexus.
translation.zh: -她完美无瑕 -她有两个芬迪包和一辆凌志

translation.en: I hear her hair's insured for $10,000. I hear she does car commercials. In Japan.
translation.zh: -她的头发保了一万美元的险 -她到日本拍汽车广告

translation.en: Her favorite movie is Varsity Blues. One time, she met John Stamos on a plane.
translation.zh: -她最喜欢的电影是《主力难当》 -她搭飞机遇见约翰史坦摩斯

translation.en: And he told her she was pretty. One time, she punched me in the face.
translation.zh: -他还说她很漂亮 -有一次她一拳打在我脸上…

translation.en: It was awesome. She always looks fierce. She always wins Spring Fling Queen.
translation.zh: -那真是太棒了 -她总是当选春季狂欢皇后

translation.en: Who cares? I care.
translation.zh: -谁在乎？ -我在乎

translation.en: Every year, the seniors throw this dance for the underclassmen called The Spring Fling.
translation.zh: 每年高三学生 都会开一个春季狂欢舞会

translation.en: And whomsoever is elected Spring Fling King and Queen automatically becomes head of the Student Activities Committee.
translation.zh: 舞会中选出的国王和皇后 将成为学生会的领导人物

translation.en: And since I am an active member of the Student Activities Committee, I would say, yeah, I care.
translation.zh: 我也是学生会的一员 所以我很在乎

translation.en: Wow, Damian, you've truly out-gayed yourself.
translation.zh: 达米安 你还真有男子气概

translation.en: Here. This map is gonna be your guide to North Shore.
translation.zh: 来 这地图是你的北岸生活指引

translation.en: Now, where you sit in the cafeteria is crucial because you got everybody there.
translation.zh: 在餐厅里坐的位置很重要 因为所有的人都在那里

translation.en: You got your freshmen, ROTC guys,
translation.zh: 有新生、大学储备军官、预校生

translation.en: preps, JV jocks,
translation.zh: 有新生、大学储备军官、预校生 初中运动员、亚洲书呆子

translation.en: Asian nerds.
translation.zh: 初中运动员、亚洲书呆子

translation.en: [Janis] Cool Asians, varsity jocks,
translation.zh: 很酷的亚洲人、运动校队

translation.en: unfriendly black hotties,
translation.zh: 嚣张的黑辣妹

translation.en: girls who eat their feelings,
translation.zh: 开怀大吃的女生

translation.en: girls who don't eat anything.
translation.zh: 不吃东西的女生

translation.en: Desperate wannabes, burnouts,
translation.zh: 做明星梦的人、没救的人

translation.en: sexually active band geeks. The greatest people you will ever meet.
translation.zh: 性泛滥的乐团怪客、最棒的人

translation.en: And the worst. Beware of The Plastics.
translation.zh: 还有最烂的人…小心那些塑胶一族

translation.en: [Jason] Hey. We're doing a lunchtime survey of new students. Can you answer a few questions?
translation.zh: 我们要做一个新生午餐调查 你能回答一些问题吗？

translation.en: Okay. Is your muffin buttered?
translation.zh: -好 -你的松饼有加奶油吗？

translation.en: -[boys snickering] -What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Would you like us to assign someone to butter your muffin?
translation.zh: 需不需要找人 帮你的松饼加上奶油？

translation.en: My what? Is he bothering you?
translation.zh: -什么？ -他在烦你吗？

translation.en: Jason, why are you such a skeez? I'm just being friendly.
translation.zh: -杰森 你怎么这么烦人？ -我只是在示好

translation.en: You were supposed to call me last night.
translation.zh: 你昨晚应该打电话给我的

translation.en: Jason. You do not come to a party at my house with Gretchen, and then scam on some poor, innocent girl right in front of us three days later.
translation.zh: 你昨天没来参加我家的派对 却在我们面前调戏其他女生

translation.en: She's not interested. Do you wanna have sex with him?
translation.zh: 她不感兴趣 你想和他发生关系吗？

translation.en: No, thank you. Good. So, it's settled.
translation.zh: -并不想 谢谢 -很好 事情解决了

translation.en: So you can go shave your back now. Bye, Jason.
translation.zh: 你该走了 再见 杰森

translation.en: [Jason scoffs] Bitch.
translation.zh: 可恶

translation.en: Wait. Sit down.
translation.zh: 等一等 坐下

translation.en: Seriously, sit down.
translation.zh: 真的 坐下

translation.en: Why don't I know you? I'm new. I just moved here from Africa.
translation.zh: -我怎么没见过你 -我刚从非洲回来

translation.en: What? I used to be home-schooled.
translation.zh: -什么？ -我以前是在家自学的

translation.en: [Regina] Wait. What? My mom taught me at home.
translation.zh: -你说什么？ -我妈妈在家里教我

translation.en: No, no. I know what home-school is. I'm not retarded. So you've actually never been to a real school before?
translation.zh: 我知道在家自学是什么 你从没真正上过学？

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.zh: 难以置信

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.zh: 太不可思议了

translation.en: I didn't say anything. Home-schooled.
translation.zh: -我什么都没说 -在家自学

translation.en: -That's really interesting. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -还真有意思 -谢谢

translation.en: But you're, like, really pretty. Thank you.
translation.zh: -你长得真不赖 -谢谢

translation.en: -So you agree? -What? You think you're really pretty.
translation.zh: 这你也同意？ 你真的认为自己漂亮？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know. Oh, my God, I love your bracelet. Where did you get it?
translation.zh: -我不知道 -你这手链哪里来的

translation.en: Oh, my mom made it for me. It's adorable.
translation.zh: -我妈妈做给我的 -真不错

translation.en: Oh, it's so fetch. What is "fetch"?
translation.zh: -真炫 -“炫”是什么意思？

translation.en: Oh, it's, like, slang. From England.
translation.zh: 这是一种俚语…英式俚语

translation.en: So, if you're from Africa, why are you white?
translation.zh: 如果你是从非洲来的 为什么你看起来像白人

translation.en: Oh, my God, Karen, you can't just ask people why they're white.
translation.zh: 你不能直接问人家 为什么他们是白人

translation.en: Could you give us some privacy for, like, one second? Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: -我们有事要商量一下 -好 请便

translation.en: Okay, you should just know that we don't do this a lot, so this is, like, a really huge deal.
translation.zh: 好 我们不常这么做 所以这是一件大事

translation.en: We wanna invite you to have lunch with us every day for the rest of the week.
translation.zh: 我们想邀请你这星期 每天中午和我们一起吃饭

translation.en: -Oh, it's okay-- -[Regina] Coolness. So we'll see you tomorrow.
translation.zh: -没关系的… -太好了 那我们明天见

translation.en: On Wednesdays, we wear pink.
translation.zh: 星期三我们穿粉红色

translation.en: Oh, my God! Okay, you have to do it, okay? And then you have to tell me all of the horrible things that Regina says.
translation.zh: 天啊 你一定要加入她们 再回来告诉我瑞吉娜说了什么

translation.en: Regina seems sweet. Regina George is not sweet.
translation.zh: -瑞吉娜看起来…人很好 -她一点都不好

translation.en: She's a scum-sucking road whore! She ruined my life!
translation.zh: 她是个人渣 她毁了我的生活

translation.en: She's fabulous, but she's evil. Hey, get out of here!
translation.zh: -她是天使脸孔魔鬼心肠 -滚出去

translation.en: Oh, my God, Danny DeVito. I love your work!
translation.zh: 丹尼迪维托 我喜欢你的作品

translation.en: -Why do you hate her? -What do you mean?
translation.zh: -你为何讨厌她？ -你什么意思？

translation.en: Regina. You seem to really hate her.
translation.zh: 你好像很恨她

translation.en: Yes. What's your question? Well, my question is, why?
translation.zh: -对 有什么问题吗？ -为什么？

translation.en: Regina started this rumor -that Janis was-- -Damian! Shall we not?
translation.zh: -瑞吉娜散播谣言… -达米安 别说行不行

translation.en: Now, look. This isn't about hating her, okay?
translation.zh: 我不是恨她

translation.en: I just think that it would be, like, a fun little experiment if you were to hang out with them, and then tell us everything that they say.
translation.zh: 只是你跟她们在一起会很有趣 还可以告诉我们她们说了什么

translation.en: What do we even talk about? Hair products.
translation.zh: -我们会谈什么？ -美发用品

translation.en: Ashton Kutcher. Is that a band?
translation.zh: -艾希顿库奇 -那是个乐团吗？

translation.en: Would you just do it? Please?
translation.zh: 反正跟她们在一起就对了

translation.en: Okay, fine. Do you have anything pink?
translation.zh: 好吧 你有粉红色的东西吗？

translation.en: -[Damian] Yes. -[Janis] No.
translation.zh: -没有 -有

translation.en: [Cady] By eighth period, I was so happy to get to math class.
translation.zh: 到了第八堂课 我真高兴终于是数学课

translation.en: I mean, I'm good at math. I understand math. Nothing in math class could mess me up.
translation.zh: 数学我很拿手 没有什么数学可以难倒我

translation.en: Hey, do you have a pencil I can borrow?
translation.zh: 能不能跟你借支笔？

translation.en: I've only had one other crush in my life. His name was Nfume, and we were five.
translation.zh: 我这一生只迷恋过一个人 他叫服姆 我们当时才五岁

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] I like you.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] Go away!
translation.zh: 走开

translation.en: [Cady] It didn't work out.
translation.zh: 可惜并不成功

translation.en: But this one hit me like a big, yellow school bus.
translation.zh: 但这个人让我心中一震

translation.en: [Ms. Norbury] Cady, what do you say? [Cady] He was... [softly] So cute.
translation.zh: -凯蒂 你说说看 -他好可爱

translation.en: I mean, A sub N equals N plus one over four.
translation.zh: 我是说An=N+1除以4

translation.en: That's right. That's good. Very good. All right, let's talk about your homework.
translation.zh: 没错 非常好 作业的话…

translation.en: Hey. How was your second day? Fine.
translation.zh: -上学第二天如何？ -还好

translation.en: -Were people nice? -No.
translation.zh: -学校里的人好不好？ -不好

translation.en: Did you make any friends? Yeah.
translation.zh: -交到朋友了吗？ -有

translation.en: [Cady] Having lunch with The Plastics was like leaving the actual world and entering "Girl World."
translation.zh: 和塑胶一族共餐 就像进入了女人世界

translation.en: And Girl World had a lot of rules.
translation.zh: 而女人世界里有一大堆规矩

translation.en: You can't wear a tank top two days in a row,
translation.zh: 你不能连穿两天背心

translation.en: and you can only wear your hair in a ponytail once a week. So, I guess you picked today.
translation.zh: 一周只能绑一次马尾 所以显然你选择了今天

translation.en: Oh, and we only wear jeans or track pants on Fridays.
translation.zh: 只有在星期五 才能穿牛仔裤或运动裤

translation.en: Now, if you break any of these rules, you can't sit with us at lunch. I mean, not just you. Like, any of us.
translation.zh: 如果违反任何规定 你就不能和我们坐在一起用餐

translation.en: Okay, like, if I was wearing jeans today, I would be sitting over there with the art freaks.
translation.zh: 如果我今天穿了牛仔裤 我就要去跟艺术怪胎一起坐

translation.en: Oh, and we always vote before we ask someone to eat lunch with us, because you have to be considerate of the rest of the group.
translation.zh: 我们在邀请人共餐前会先投票 你必须要考虑周全

translation.en: Well, I mean, you wouldn't buy a skirt without asking your friends first if it looks good on you.
translation.zh: 你不会不先征询朋友的意见 就买裙子吧

translation.en: I wouldn't?
translation.zh: -不会吗？ -没错

translation.en: Right. Oh, and it's the same with guys.
translation.zh: -不会吗？ -没错 交男友也一样

translation.en: Like, you may think you like someone,
translation.zh: 交男友也一样 你会以为你喜欢上了某人 但那有可能是误判

translation.en: but you could be wrong.
translation.zh: 你会以为你喜欢上了某人 但那有可能是误判

translation.en: A hundred and twenty calories, and forty-eight calories from fat. What percent is that?
translation.zh: 120卡路里中 有48卡路里 会变成脂肪 那是百分之几？

translation.en: Forty-eight into one-twenty? I'm only eating foods with less than 30% calories from fat.
translation.zh: -48除120？ -我只吃进30%的脂肪

translation.en: It's 40%. Well, 48 over 120 equals X over 100,
translation.zh: 是40% 48除以120等于X除以100

translation.en: and then you cross-multiply and get the value of X.
translation.zh: 交叉相乘之后就会得到Ｘ

translation.en: Whatever. I'm getting cheese fries.
translation.zh: 管它的 我还是要吃芝士薯条

translation.en: So, have you seen any guys that you think are cute yet?
translation.zh: 你有任何看上眼的男生吗？

translation.en: Well, there's this guy in my calculus class--
translation.zh: -微积分班上有一个男生 -叫什么名字？

translation.en: -Who is it? -It's a senior?
translation.zh: -微积分班上有一个男生 -叫什么名字？ -他是高三学生吗？ -他叫艾朗山缪

translation.en: His name's Aaron Samuels.
translation.zh: -他是高三学生吗？ -他叫艾朗山缪

translation.en: -[gasps] No. No, no. -[Gretchen] No! Oh, no, you can't like Aaron Samuels.
translation.zh: -不行 -你不能喜欢艾朗山缪

translation.en: That's Regina's ex-boyfriend. They went out for a year.
translation.zh: -他是瑞吉娜的前男友 -他们约会了一年

translation.en: Yeah, and then she was devastated when he broke up with her last summer.
translation.zh: 他和她分手时 她难过到不行

translation.en: I thought she dumped him for Shane Oman. Okay, irregardless.
translation.zh: -我还以为她为尚恩才甩了他 -都一样

translation.en: Ex-boyfriends are just off-limits to friends. I mean, that's just, like, the rules of feminism.
translation.zh: 别人的前男友绝对不能碰 这是女权主义的规则

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll never tell Regina what you said.
translation.zh: 别担心 你刚说的话我不会告诉瑞吉娜

translation.en: It'll be our little secret.
translation.zh: 这会是我们之间的秘密

translation.en: [Cady] Even though I wasn't allowed to like Aaron,
translation.zh: 即使我不能喜欢艾朗

translation.en: I was still allowed to look at him. And think about him.
translation.zh: 但我还是可以看着他 并想着他

translation.en: And talk to him.
translation.zh: 和他谈话

translation.en: [Cady] Hey-- Hey, you're the Africa girl, right?
translation.zh: -你从非洲回来？ -对

translation.en: -Yeah. -I'm Kevin Gnapoor, captain of the North Shore Mathletes.
translation.zh: 我叫凯文纳普 我是数学竞赛组组长

translation.en: We participate in math challenges against other high schools around the state,
translation.zh: 我们代表学校参加数学竞赛

translation.en: and we can get twice as much funding if we've got a girl. So, you should think about joining.
translation.zh: 如果有女生加入我们 经费可增加一倍 考虑看看吧

translation.en: Oh, you'd be perfect for it. Yeah, definitely.
translation.zh: -你是最佳人选 -好 我会考虑的

translation.en: Great, great. Let me give you my card.
translation.zh: 这是我的名片

translation.en: [Kevin] Okay, so think it over.
translation.zh: （凯文纳普 数学热衷者/傻瓜） 好 不妨…考虑一下吧

translation.en: Because we'd like to get jackets.
translation.zh: 因为我们想争取到外套

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Get in, loser. We're going shopping.
translation.zh: 上车 我们要去逛街

translation.en: [Cady] Regina's like the Barbie doll I never had. I'd never seen anybody so glamorous.
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜简直就像个芭比娃娃 她是如此迷人

translation.en: [Karen] So, how do you like North Shore? [Cady] It's good.
translation.zh: -你觉得北岸高中如何？ -很好

translation.en: I think I'm joining the Mathletes. -[Regina] No! No, no. -[Gretchen] No, no.
translation.zh: -我要加入数学竞赛小组 -不行…

translation.en: You cannot do that. That is social suicide.
translation.zh: 你不能加入 那会扼杀你的社交生活

translation.en: Damn, you are so lucky you have us to guide you.
translation.zh: 还好 有我们在旁边指导你 算你走运

translation.en: [Cady] Being at Old Orchard Mall kind of reminded me of being home in Africa.
translation.zh: 在购物中心里 让我有回到非洲的感觉

translation.en: By the watering hole. When the animals are in heat.
translation.zh: 就像动物太热时 会聚集在水池边一样

translation.en: -Oh, my God, there's Jason! -[Karen] Where?
translation.zh: -天啊 那是杰森 -在哪里？

translation.en: Oh, there he is.
translation.zh: 他在那里

translation.en: And he's with Taylor Wedell. I heard they're going out.
translation.zh: -他和泰勒威德一起 -听说他们俩在一起

translation.en: Wait. Jason's not going out with Taylor. No. He cannot blow you off like that.
translation.zh: 杰森没有跟泰勒在一起 不 他不可能这样对你的

translation.en: He's such a little skeez. Give me your phone.
translation.zh: 他真过分 把电话给我

translation.en: You're not gonna call him, right? Do you think I'm an idiot?
translation.zh: -你不会打给他吧？ -你以为我是白痴吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: -Wedell on South Boulevard. -Caller ID.
translation.zh: -住南街的威德 -会显示来电者身分

translation.en: Not when you connect from Information.
translation.zh: 经过总机转接就不会

translation.en: -[woman on phone] Hello? -Hello. May I please speak to Taylor Wedell?
translation.zh: -你好 -请找泰勒威德

translation.en: She's not home yet. Who's calling? Oh, this is Susan from Planned Parenthood.
translation.zh: -她还没回来 请问你是哪位？ -我是计划生育中心的苏珊

translation.en: I have her test results. If you can have her give me a call as soon as she can. It's urgent. Thank you.
translation.zh: 她的检验报告出来了 请她回我电话 有急事

translation.en: She's not going out with anyone. Okay, that was so fetch.
translation.zh: -她再也不能和任何人约会了 -好 这招真是炫毙了

translation.en: Mom.
translation.zh: 妈

translation.en: Wow. Your house is really nice. I know, right?
translation.zh: -你家真漂亮 -没错吧

translation.en: Make sure you check out her mom's boob job. They're hard as rocks.
translation.zh: 你要见识一下她妈妈隆的胸 它们硬得跟石头一样

translation.en: I'm home! Hey, Kylie. Hey.
translation.zh: -我回来了 凯莉 -嘿

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey! How are my best girlfriends?
translation.zh: 我的宝贝们 你们好

translation.en: Hey, Mrs. George. This is Cady. Hello, sweetheart.
translation.zh: -乔治太太 这位是凯蒂 -你好

translation.en: Hi. Welcome to our home.
translation.zh: -你好 -欢迎光临

translation.en: Just want you to know, if you need anything, don't be shy, okay? There are no rules in this house.
translation.zh: 需要什么尽管说 这屋子里百无禁忌

translation.en: I'm not like a regular mom. I'm a cool mom. Right, Regina?
translation.zh: 我和一般妈妈不同 我是酷妈 对不对？瑞吉娜

translation.en: -Please stop talking. -Okay.
translation.zh: -别再说了 -好

translation.en: I'm gonna make you girls a "hump day" treat. ♪ My milkshake brings All the boys to the yard ♪
translation.zh: 我来准备些东西好好招待你们

translation.en: This is your room? It was my parents' room, but I made them trade me.
translation.zh: -这是你的房间？ -是我爸妈的 我跟他们交换

translation.en: [Regina] Hey, put on 98.8.
translation.zh: 听98点8兆赫

translation.en: Cady, do you even know who sings this?
translation.zh: 凯蒂 你知道这是谁唱的吗？

translation.en: Um, The Spice Girls? I love her. She's like a Martian.
translation.zh: -辣妹合唱团？ -我喜欢她 她像个外星人

translation.en: [Karen] God, my hips are huge! [Gretchen] Oh, please. I hate my calves.
translation.zh: -我屁股真大 -我讨厌我的小腿

translation.en: [Regina] At least you guys can wear halters. I've got man shoulders.
translation.zh: 你们可以穿露背装 我的肩膀太壮 像男生

translation.en: [Cady] I used to think there was just fat and skinny.
translation.zh: 我一直以为只有胖瘦的差别

translation.en: Apparently, there's a lot of things that can be wrong on your body.
translation.zh: 但显然那还不够精确

translation.en: My hairline is so weird. My pores are huge.
translation.zh: -我的发际线很怪异 -我的毛孔太大

translation.en: My nail beds suck.
translation.zh: 我的甲床好丑

translation.en: I have really bad breath in the morning.
translation.zh: 我早上起来口气很难闻

translation.en: Hey, you guys. Happy hour is from 4:00 to 6:00!
translation.zh: 你们好 四点到六点是畅饮时光

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Um. Is there alcohol in this?
translation.zh: 里面有酒精吗？

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, God, honey, no. What kind of mother do you think I am? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 当然没有 你以为我是什么样的母亲

translation.en: Why? Do you want a little bit? 'Cause if you're gonna drink, I'd rather you do it in the house.
translation.zh: 如果你要喝酒的话 我宁愿你在家里喝

translation.en: -No, thank you. -Okay.
translation.zh: 不用了 谢谢

translation.en: So, you guys, what is the 411?
translation.zh: 好了各位 有什么最新消息？

translation.en: What has everybody been up to?
translation.zh: 最近大家都在做些什么？

translation.en: What is the hot gossip? Tell me everything. What are you guys listening to? What's the cool jams?
translation.zh: 最热门的八卦是什么？ 你们都听些什么音乐？

translation.en: Mom. Could you go fix your hair?
translation.zh: 妈 你能不能去整理一下头发

translation.en: Okay. You girls keep me young. Oh, I love you so much.
translation.zh: 好 你们让我保持青春 我真是太爱你们了

translation.en: Oh, my God, I remember this. I haven't looked at that in forever.
translation.zh: -天啊 我记得这个 -我好久没看了

translation.en: Come check it out, Cady. It's our Burn Book.
translation.zh: 看看吧 凯蒂 那是我们的麻辣书

translation.en: See, we cut out girls' pictures from the yearbook, and then we wrote comments.
translation.zh: 我们从年报上剪下女生的照片 并给她们加上评论

translation.en: [Karen] "Trang Pak is a grotsky little byotch."
translation.zh: 白川是个古怪的小贱人 现在还是

translation.en: [Regina] Still true. [Gretchen] "Dawn Schweitzer is a fat virgin." -Still half true. -[Gretchen and Karen giggling]
translation.zh: -东史维则是肥处女 -有一半是真的

translation.en: "Amber D'Alessio." She made out with a hot dog.
translation.zh: 安柏达烈西用热狗自慰

translation.en: "Janis Ian, dyke."
translation.zh: 詹妮丝伊恩 女同性恋

translation.en: [Karen] Who is that? [Gretchen] I think that's that kid Damian.
translation.zh: -这是谁？ -达米安

translation.en: Yeah. He's almost too gay to function. Ha. That's funny. Put that in there.
translation.zh: -他是个十足的娘娘腔 -很有趣 把它写进去

translation.en: [Cady] Oh, no. Maybe that was only okay when Janis said it.
translation.zh: 糟了 这句话可能只有詹妮丝能说

translation.en: And they have this book. This Burn Book where they write mean things about all the girls in our grade.
translation.zh: 她们对年报里的每个女孩 都下了恶毒的评论

translation.en: What does it say about me?
translation.zh: 她们怎么说我？

translation.en: -You're not in it. -Those bitches.
translation.zh: -你不在里面 -那些贱人

translation.en: Will this minimize my pores? No. Caddy, you gotta steal that book.
translation.zh: -这能使我的毛孔缩小吗？ -不能 你得去偷那本书

translation.en: -No way! -Oh, come on. We could publish it, and then everybody
translation.zh: -不行 -我们可以把它出版

translation.en: would see what an ax-wound she really is.
translation.zh: 这样所有人都知道她的德性了

translation.en: I don't steal. That is for your feet.
translation.zh: -我才不偷东西 -这是给脚用的

translation.en: Caddy, there are two kinds of evil people.
translation.zh: 坏人有两种

translation.en: People who do evil stuff, and people who see evil stuff being done and don't try to stop it.
translation.zh: 一是做坏事的人 另一是见人为恶却不阻止的人

translation.en: Does that mean I'm morally obligated to burn that lady's outfit?
translation.zh: 难道看见人家穿得丑 就要自告奋勇去烧她的衣服吗

translation.en: Oh, my God, that's Ms. Norbury. I love seeing teachers outside of school.
translation.zh: -那是诺布里太太 -我喜欢在学校外面看见老师

translation.en: It's like seeing a dog walk on its hind legs.
translation.zh: 就像看见狐狸露出尾巴来一样

translation.en: Ah, hey, guys, what's up? I didn't know you worked here.
translation.zh: 你们好 我不知道你在这里工作

translation.en: Yeah, moderately priced soaps are my calling.
translation.zh: 我特别喜欢中价位的肥皂

translation.en: You shopping? No. No, I'm just here with my boyfriend.
translation.zh: -你也来购物吗？ -不 我只是和男友出来走走

translation.en: Joking. Sometimes older people make jokes.
translation.zh: 开玩笑的 年纪大的人常常爱说笑

translation.en: My nana takes her wig off when she's drunk.
translation.zh: 我祖母喝醉时会把假发拿下来

translation.en: Your nana and I have that in common.
translation.zh: 我和你祖母有同样的习惯

translation.en: No, actually, I'm just here because I bartend a couple nights a week down at P.J. Calamity's.
translation.zh: 事实上 我每星期有几个晚上 会在卡拉米提担任酒保

translation.en: Cady, I hope you do join Mathletes, you know,
translation.zh: 我希望你能加入数学竞赛小组

translation.en: because we start in a couple weeks, and I would love to have a girl on the team, just, you know, so the team could meet a girl.
translation.zh: 我希望有女生加入小组 这样其他人才有机会见识女生

translation.en: I think I'm gonna do it. Great.
translation.zh: -我想我会加入的 -太好了

translation.en: You can't join Mathletes. It's social suicide.
translation.zh: 你不要加入 那等于扼杀社交生活

translation.en: Thanks, Damian. Well, this has been sufficiently awkward.
translation.zh: 谢了 达米安 好 很高兴在这里见到你们

translation.en: And I'll see you guys tomorrow. -Bye. -Bye.
translation.zh: -我们明天见 -再见

translation.en: Oh, man, that is bleak.
translation.zh: 她真是冷毙了

translation.en: So, when are you gonna see Regina again? I can't spy on her anymore. It's weird.
translation.zh: -你何时再跟瑞吉娜碰面？ -我不想再监视她了

translation.en: Come on, she's never gonna find out. It's just... It'll be like our little secret.
translation.zh: 她不会发现的 这是我们之间的小秘密

translation.en: -Hello? -I know your secret.
translation.zh: -你好 -我知道你的秘密了

translation.en: [Cady] Oh, God, busted. Just start apologizing and crying. No, play it cool.
translation.zh: 天啊 被逮到了 哭着求饶？ 不行 要沉着以对

translation.en: Secret? What are you saying about? Gretchen told me that you like Aaron Samuels.
translation.zh: -什么秘密？ -葛瑞珍告诉我你喜欢艾朗

translation.en: I mean, I don't care, do whatever you want. But let me just tell you something about Aaron.
translation.zh: 你想怎么样都行 但我要告诉你一些艾朗的事

translation.en: All he cares about is school, and his mom, and his friends.
translation.zh: 他只在乎学校和他妈妈及朋友的事

translation.en: Is that bad? But if you like him, whatever.
translation.zh: -这样不好吗？ -你喜欢就好

translation.en: I mean, I could talk to him for you if you want. Really? You would do that?
translation.zh: -我可以帮你美言几句 -真的吗？你真愿意这么做？

translation.en: I mean, nothing embarrassing, though, right? Oh, no, trust me. I know exactly how to play it.
translation.zh: -不会害我出糗吧？ -不会 相信我 我自有分寸

translation.en: But wait. Aren't you so mad at Gretchen for telling me?
translation.zh: 你不气葛瑞珍告诉我这件事？

translation.en: No. Because if you are, you can tell me. It was a really bitchy thing for her to do.
translation.zh: -不会 -这是很低级的行为

translation.en: Yeah, it was pretty bitchy, but I'm not mad. I mean, I guess she just likes the attention.
translation.zh: 这样的确很低级 但我想她只是想引起注意

translation.en: See, Gretch? I told you she's not mad at you. I can't believe you think I like attention!
translation.zh: -我就说她不会生你的气 -你真的认为我想引人注意？

translation.en: Okay, love you. See you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 好了 明天见

translation.en: [Cady] I had survived my first three-way calling attack.
translation.zh: 我刚经历了 我的第一次三方对质通话

translation.en: And with Regina's blessing, I started talking to Aaron more and more.
translation.zh: 有了瑞吉娜的祝福之后 我开始多跟艾朗谈话

translation.en: On October 3rd, he asked me what day it was.
translation.zh: 10月3日那天 他问我当天是什么日期

translation.en: It's October 3rd.
translation.zh: 10月3日

translation.en: Two weeks later, we spoke again.
translation.zh: 两周后 我们又再次交谈

translation.en: It's raining. Yeah.
translation.zh: -下雨了 -对

translation.en: But I wanted things to move faster. So I followed my instincts.
translation.zh: 但我希望事情能进展得快些 于是我开始采取主动

translation.en: Hey, um, I'm totally lost. Can you help me?
translation.zh: 我听不懂 你能不能教我？

translation.en: -[Cady] But I wasn't lost. -Yeah. I knew exactly what Ms. Norbury was talking about.
translation.zh: 其实我非常清楚 我知道诺布里太太在教什么

translation.en: It's a factorial, so you multiply each one by N.
translation.zh: 这是阶乘 每个都要乘上一个Ｎ

translation.en: [Cady] Wrong.
translation.zh: 错了

translation.en: Is that the summation? Yeah, they're the same thing.
translation.zh: -那是总和吗？ -对 一样的

translation.en: [Cady] Wrong. He was so wrong.
translation.zh: 又错 他全搞错了

translation.en: -Thanks. I, uh, I get it now. -[bell ringing]
translation.zh: -谢谢 我懂了 -把灯打开

translation.en: [Ms. Nordbury] Lights, please. Okay. See you guys tomorrow.
translation.zh: 好 明天见

translation.en: We're having a Halloween party at my friend Chris' tonight. You wanna come?
translation.zh: 我们今晚有个万圣节派对 你要来吗？

translation.en: Yeah, sure. Great. Here's where it is.
translation.zh: -好 -很好 地点是这里

translation.en: It's a costume party. People get pretty into it.
translation.zh: 这是个化妆舞会 大家都喜欢这么玩

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: That flier admits one person only, so don't bring some other guy with you.
translation.zh: 一张传单只容许一个人入场 所以别带其他人来

translation.en: Grool. I meant to say "cool," and then I started to say "great."
translation.zh: 好酷 我是想说“酷” 但却先说了“好”

translation.en: Right. Well... Grool.
translation.zh: 没错 那么…好酷

translation.en: See you tonight.
translation.zh: 晚上见

translation.en: Hey, Africa. You staying for the Mathletes meeting?
translation.zh: 非洲女 你会留下来 参加数学竞赛会议吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我马上回来

translation.en: [Cady] Okay, I lied. But I had to go home and work on my costume.
translation.zh: 好吧 我说了谎 但我必须回家准备晚上的服装

translation.en: In the regular world,
translation.zh: 在正常人的世界里

translation.en: Halloween is when children dress up in costumes and beg for candy.
translation.zh: 万圣节是孩子们穿着 奇装异服乞讨糖果的节日

translation.en: In Girl World, Halloween is the one night a year when a girl can dress like a total slut
translation.zh: 在女人世界中 则是女生们卖弄风骚的时刻

translation.en: and no other girls can say anything about it.
translation.zh: 其他的女孩也无法置喙

translation.en: The hard-core girls just wear lingerie and some form of animal ears.
translation.zh: 最惹火的女孩则只穿内衣 及戴上动物耳朵

translation.en: [Mrs. George] Doesn't she look great, honey?
translation.zh: 她看起来是不是很棒？

translation.en: -Ha! -What are you? I'm a mouse. Duh.
translation.zh: -你扮成什么？ -我是只老鼠

translation.en: [Cady] Unfortunately, no one told me about the slut rule. So I showed up like this.
translation.zh: 没人告诉我要卖弄风骚这件事 因此我就扮成这样出席

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Yes! Yes!
translation.zh: 宙斯！

translation.en: -Hey. -[Karen gasps]
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Why are you dressed so scary? It's Halloween.
translation.zh: -你怎么扮得这么恐怖？ -今天是万圣节

translation.en: Have you seen Jason? You know who's looking fine tonight?
translation.zh: -看到杰森了吗？ -你知道谁今晚看起来很正点

translation.en: Seth Mosakowski. Okay, you did not just say that.
translation.zh: -沙思莫沙考斯基 -你不是说真的吧

translation.en: What? He's a good kisser. He's your cousin.
translation.zh: -他是接吻高手 -他是你表亲

translation.en: Yeah, but he's my first cousin.
translation.zh: -没错 他是我的一等亲表哥 -对

translation.en: -Right. -So you have your cousins,
translation.zh: -没错 他是我的一等亲表哥 -对 所以你有表亲 再下来是一等亲、二等亲…

translation.en: and then you have your first cousins, then you have your second cousins--
translation.zh: 所以你有表亲 再下来是一等亲、二等亲…

translation.en: No, honey. Mmm-mmm.
translation.zh: 不是这样的

translation.en: That's not right, is it? That is so not right.
translation.zh: -不是这样？ -错得离谱

translation.en: -[Aaron] Hey! -Hey.
translation.zh: -你好 -你好

translation.en: You made it. And you are a zombie bride.
translation.zh: 你来了 而且你装扮成…僵尸新娘

translation.en: An "ex-wife."
translation.zh: -是前妻 -我喜欢

translation.en: Love it. Can I get you something to drink?
translation.zh: -是前妻 -我喜欢 -想喝点什么吗？ -好

translation.en: -Yeah. -Be right back.
translation.zh: -想喝点什么吗？ -好

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 马上回来

translation.en: Karen, stop it. Don't, Karen-- Hey, Seth!
translation.zh: -凯伦 别这样 -你好 沙思

translation.en: Hey. Oh, no.
translation.zh: -你好 -不会吧…

translation.en: Didn't anybody tell you? You were supposed to wear a costume.
translation.zh: 没人告诉你今晚是化妆舞会吗

translation.en: Oh, shut up.
translation.zh: 少来

translation.en: I need to talk to you. You know that girl Cady?
translation.zh: 我有话要跟你说 你认识凯蒂吧？

translation.en: Yeah, she's cool. I invited her tonight.
translation.zh: 她很酷 我今晚有约她来

translation.en: Well, be careful because she has a huge crush on you.
translation.zh: 小心点 因为她很喜欢你

translation.en: Really? How do you know? Because she told me.
translation.zh: -是吗？你怎么知道？ -她告诉我的

translation.en: She tells everybody. It's kind of cute, actually.
translation.zh: 她告诉了所有的人 这点实在很可爱

translation.en: She's like a little girl. She, like, writes all over her notebook, "Mrs. Aaron Samuels."
translation.zh: 她像个小女孩 在笔记本上签艾朗山缪太太

translation.en: And she made this T-shirt that says "I heart Aaron," and she wears it under all her clothes.
translation.zh: 她在衣服里穿着上面有 “我爱艾朗”字样的Ｔ恤

translation.en: Oh, come on. Well, who can blame her? I mean, you're gorgeous.
translation.zh: -我才不信 -也不能怪她 你太帅了

translation.en: And okay, look, I'm not saying she's a stalker, but she saved this Kleenex you used,
translation.zh: 我并非说她是偏执狂 但她保留你用过的卫生纸

translation.en: and she said she's gonna do some kind of African voodoo with it to make you like her.
translation.zh: 她打算施以非洲巫术 让你喜欢上她

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [Cady] This was it. Regina said she would talk to Aaron for me, and now she was.
translation.zh: 没错 瑞吉娜正在帮我说好话

translation.en: I know she's kind of socially retarded and weird, but she's my friend,
translation.zh: 我知道她是社交智障 人又古怪 但她是我的朋友

translation.en: so just promise me you won't make fun of her.
translation.zh: 我知道她是社交智障 人又古怪 但她是我的朋友 答应我你不会玩弄她

translation.en: Of course I'm not gonna make fun of her.
translation.zh: 我当然不会

translation.en: [Cady] How could Janis hate Regina? She was such a good--
translation.zh: 詹妮丝为什么会恨瑞吉娜 她是这么好心的…

translation.en: [shouts] Slut!
translation.zh: 烂货

translation.en: What are you doing? You broke up with me.
translation.zh: 你在做什么？我们已经分手了

translation.en: That's crazy. Why would I break up with you? You're so hot.
translation.zh: 真奇怪 我为什么会和你分手 你这么迷人

translation.en: That's a scary mask, bro.
translation.zh: 那可真够恐怖的 老兄

translation.en: I had never felt this feeling before. I could hear my heartbeat in my ears.
translation.zh: 我从没有过这种感觉 我可以听到自己的心跳

translation.en: My stomach felt like it was going to fall out my butt. I had this lump in my throat like after you dry-swallow a big pill.
translation.zh: 我的胃就像要从我体内掉出来一样

translation.en: I hated Regina. I hated her!
translation.zh: 我恨瑞吉娜 我恨她

translation.en: She took him back. Regina took Aaron back.
translation.zh: 她吃回头草 她又回头钓艾朗

translation.en: Oh, no, Caddy.
translation.zh: 天啊 凯蒂

translation.en: Why would she do that? Because she's a life-ruiner. She ruins people's lives.
translation.zh: -她为何这么做？ -她是个破坏狂

translation.en: When we were 13, she made people sign this petition saying that Janis was--
translation.zh: 我们13岁时 她要我们 签一份请愿书说詹妮丝…

translation.en: Damian! Please! Look, she's not gonna get away with this again, okay? We're gonna do something.
translation.zh: 达米安 别说了 我们得采取一些行动

translation.en: We are?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Regina George is an evil dictator. Now, how do you overthrow a dictator?
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜乔治是个邪恶的独裁者 要怎么推翻独裁者？

translation.en: You cut off her resources.
translation.zh: 就是切断她的资源

translation.en: Regina would be nothing without her high-status man candy,
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜如果少了姣好的身材 和那些帅哥

translation.en: technically good physique, and ignorant band of loyal followers.
translation.zh: 以及头脑简单的追随者 那她就一无是处了

translation.en: Now, Caddy, if we want this to work,
translation.zh: 凯蒂 这招如果要成功

translation.en: you are gonna have to keep hanging out with them like nothing is wrong. Can you do it?
translation.zh: 你必须若无其事的 继续跟她们一起 你能办到吗？

translation.en: I can do it. Okay, let's rock this bitch.
translation.zh: -我可以 -好 给她们点颜色瞧瞧

translation.en: [Cady] Pretending like nothing was wrong turned out to be surprisingly easy.
translation.zh: 要装作若无其事其实很简单

translation.en: And Regina wanted me to tell you that she was trying to hook you up with Aaron,
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜本想撮合你和艾朗

translation.en: but he was just interested in getting her back. And that's not Regina's fault.
translation.zh: 但艾朗希望瑞吉娜回到他身边 这不能怪她

translation.en: No, I know. Okay, so you're not mad at Regina?
translation.zh: -我知道 -你不怪瑞吉娜？

translation.en: -God, no. -Oh, okay, good.
translation.zh: -当然不会 -好

translation.en: Because Regina wanted me to give you this.
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜要我转交这个给你

translation.en: It's called the South Beach Fat Flush, and all you drink is cranberry juice for 72 hours.
translation.zh: 这个可以去脂 你只要喝72小时的蔓越橘汁

translation.en: This isn't even cranberry juice. It's cranberry juice cocktail. It's all sugar.
translation.zh: 这不是蔓越橘汁 里面都是糖

translation.en: I wanna lose three pounds. [Aaron] You're crazy.
translation.zh: -我想再减三磅 -你疯了

translation.en: Why do you wear your hair like that? You hair looks so sexy pushed back. Cady, will you please tell him his hair looks sexy pushed back.
translation.zh: 你的头发怎么了？ 凯蒂 告诉他往后梳会更性感

translation.en: [Cady] Regina was dangling Aaron in front of me on purpose.
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜在我面前炫耀艾朗

translation.en: I knew how this would be settled in the animal world.
translation.zh: 我知道这在动物世界里要怎么解决

translation.en: But this was Girl World. Your hair looks sexy pushed back.
translation.zh: -但现在是在女人世界中 -你的头发往后梳会更性感

translation.en: And in Girl World, all the fighting had to be sneaky.
translation.zh: 在女人世界中 所有的战争都须步步为营

translation.en: All this cranberry juice is making me break out.
translation.zh: 这些蔓越橘汁让我小豆豆都出来了

translation.en: Wait. I have this really good skin stuff I'll bring you.
translation.zh: 我有很好的护肤用品要给你

translation.en: [Cady] We kept our eyes open for opportunities for sabotage.
translation.zh: 我们不放过任何可进行破坏的机会

translation.en: Regina. -Here you go. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -瑞吉娜 -谢谢你

translation.en: -Hey. -[Aaron] Hey.
translation.zh: -你好 -你好

translation.en: -Your face smells like peppermint. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 你的脸闻起来有薄荷味

translation.en: [Janis] This is ass, you guys. It's been a month, and all we've done is make Regina's face smell like a foot.
translation.zh: 真够蠢的 已经一个月了 我们只让她的脸闻起来像脚

translation.en: I've been really busy with choir. We gotta crack Gretchen Wieners.
translation.zh: -我最近在忙合唱团的事 -我们先踢爆葛瑞珍温纳

translation.en: If we crack Gretchen, then we crack the lock on Regina's whole dirty history.
translation.zh: 然后再踢爆所有瑞吉娜的丑事

translation.en: -Say "crack" again. -Crack. All right, let's reconvene tonight.
translation.zh: -跟我说“踢爆” -“踢爆” 今晚集合

translation.en: I can't. I have to go to Regina's to practice for the talent show.
translation.zh: 今晚不行 我要去瑞吉娜家练习才艺表演

translation.en: We're doing a dance to this song-- [both] "Jingle Bell Rock."
translation.zh: -我们要排练一支舞 -“圣诞铃声响”

translation.en: You guys know that song?
translation.zh: 你们听过？

translation.en: Everybody in the English-speaking world knows that song.
translation.zh: 所有英语世界的人都听过

translation.en: They do it every year. Well, I have to learn it. Uh-oh. Go.
translation.zh: -这首歌每年必唱 -我必须学会它 糟了 快走

translation.en: Hey. Why were you talking to Janis Ian?
translation.zh: -你好 -你为什么和詹妮丝伊恩讲话

translation.en: I don't know, I mean, she's so weird. She just, you know, came up to me -and started talking to me about crack. -[snickers]
translation.zh: 我不知道 她很怪 她跟我讲什么吸毒的事

translation.en: She's so pathetic. Let me tell you something about Janis Ian.
translation.zh: 她真可悲 我来告诉你一些她的事

translation.en: We were best friends in middle school. I know, right?
translation.zh: 我们在中学时是最要好的朋友

translation.en: It's so embarrassing. I don't even... Whatever.
translation.zh: 说来惭愧 我甚至不…算了

translation.en: So, then in eighth grade, I started going out with my first boyfriend, Kyle, who was totally gorgeous, but then he moved to Indiana.
translation.zh: 所以我开始和凯尔约会 但他搬到印第安那州去了

translation.en: And Janis was, like, weirdly jealous of him. Like, if I would blow her off to hang out with Kyle,
translation.zh: 詹妮丝很忌妒他 好像我为了他而抛弃她一样

translation.en: she'd be like, "Why didn't you call me back?" And I'd be like, "Why are you so obsessed with me?"
translation.zh: 她说 你为什么不打电话给我 我说 你的占有欲太强了

translation.en: So then, for my birthday party, which was an all-girls pool party,
translation.zh: 在我生日那天办了一个 全是女孩子的游泳池派对

translation.en: I was like, "Janis, I can't invite you, because I think you're a lesbian."
translation.zh: 我认为她是女同志 因此没有邀请她

translation.en: I mean, I couldn't have a lesbian at my party. There are gonna be girls there in their bathing suits.
translation.zh: 我不能邀一个女同志来参加 全部女生都只穿泳装的派对

translation.en: I mean, right? She was a lesbian. So, then her mom called my mom and started yelling at her. It was so retarded.
translation.zh: 因为她是女同志 她妈还对我妈大吼 真过分

translation.en: And then she dropped out of school because no one would talk to her. When she came back in the fall for high school,
translation.zh: 之后她就辍学了 因为没人愿意和她讲话

translation.en: all of her hair was cut off, and she was totally weird, and now I guess she's on crack.
translation.zh: 她回来时把头发剃光 举止怪异 我猜她在吸毒

translation.en: Oh, my God! I love your skirt. Where did you get it?
translation.zh: 天啊 这裙子真好看 你在哪里买的？

translation.en: Uh, it was my mom's in the '80s. [gasps] Vintage. So adorable.
translation.zh: -是我妈在80年代穿的裙子 -好复古 真漂亮

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: That is the ugliest F-ing skirt I've ever seen.
translation.zh: 那是我所见过最难看的裙子

translation.en: Oh, my God, I love your bracelet. Where did you get it?
translation.zh: 天啊 这条手链真好看 你在哪里买的？

translation.en: So, are you gonna send any candy canes? No. I don't send them, I just get them.
translation.zh: -你会送拐杖糖给人吗？ -我只收不送

translation.en: So, you better send me one, byotch. Love you.
translation.zh: 所以你最好也送我一根 先走了

translation.en: [Cady] I was definitely sending her one. I was gonna use three candy canes to crack Gretchen Wieners.
translation.zh: 我当然要送她一根 我要用三根糖来踢爆葛瑞珍

translation.en: Three, please.
translation.zh: 我要三根

translation.en: "Why, man, he doth bestride the narrow world like a colossus"
translation.zh: “他犹如庞然大物般 支配着这小小的世界”…

translation.en: might translate into, "Why is he so huge and obnoxious?"
translation.zh: 可以翻译成 “他为何如此巨大且可憎”

translation.en: Candy cane-grams! Okay, hurry up.
translation.zh: -拐杖糖大使 -好 快点

translation.en: Taylor Zimmerman? Two for you.
translation.zh: 泰勒契默曼 你有两根

translation.en: Glenn Cocco? Four for you, Glenn Cocco. You go, Glenn Cocco.
translation.zh: 葛连寇可 你有四根 不错 葛连寇可

translation.en: And, uh, Caddy Heron. Do we have a Caddy Heron here?
translation.zh: 还有…甘蒂哈朗 有甘蒂哈朗这个人吗？

translation.en: It's Cady. Oh, Cady, here you go. -One for you. -Um--
translation.zh: -是凯蒂 -好 你有一根

translation.en: And none for Gretchen Wieners. Bye.
translation.zh: 葛瑞珍温纳没有 再见

translation.en: Who's that from?
translation.zh: 那是谁送的？

translation.en: "Thanks for being such a great friend. Love, Regina." That's so sweet.
translation.zh: “谢谢你成为如此的良朋益友 爱你的瑞吉娜” 真贴心

translation.en: [teacher] Okay, back to Caesar.
translation.zh: 好 回到凯撒大帝…

translation.en: [Cady] Once Gretchen thought Regina was mad at her, the secrets started pouring out.
translation.zh: 一旦葛瑞珍认为瑞吉娜在 生她的气 秘密就会宣泄而出

translation.en: All I had to do was wait for one we could use. [Mr. Duvall] Thank you.
translation.zh: 我只要等待一个可利用的即可

translation.en: Welcome to the North Shore High School winter talent show.
translation.zh: 欢迎光临北岸高中冬季才艺表演

translation.en: Let me hear you make some noise.
translation.zh: 让我听听你们的欢呼

translation.en: All right, settle down.
translation.zh: 很好 安静下来

translation.en: Our first act calls himself a star on the rise.
translation.zh: 我们的第一位表演者 自称是明日之星

translation.en: Let's hear it for Damian.
translation.zh: 让我们欢迎达米安

translation.en: Don't look at me.
translation.zh: 别看着我

translation.en: ♪ Every day is so wonderful ♪
translation.zh: 每一天都如此精彩

translation.en: I mean, why would Regina send you guys candy canes and not me?
translation.zh: 为什么瑞吉娜送你们拐杖糖 而我却没有？

translation.en: Maybe she forgot about you. Yeah, Regina has been acting kind of weird lately.
translation.zh: -也许她忘了 -她最近有点怪怪的

translation.en: I mean, is something bothering her?
translation.zh: 她在烦些什么吗？

translation.en: Well, I mean, her parents totally don't sleep in the same bed anymore, if that's what you mean.
translation.zh: 她的父母再也不同床共枕了

translation.en: Oh, my God. Don't tell her I told you that.
translation.zh: 天啊 别告诉她是我说的

translation.en: ♪ I am beautiful ♪ ♪ In every single way ♪
translation.zh: 我各方面都如此美丽

translation.en: ♪ Yes, words can't Bring me down ♪
translation.zh: 是啊 言语不能让我倒下

translation.en: ♪ Don't you Bring me down today ♪
translation.zh: 所以今天你不要让我倒下

translation.en: I mean, no offense, but why would she send you a candy cane?
translation.zh: 恕我直言 但她为何会送你拐杖糖呢？

translation.en: She doesn't even like you that much.
translation.zh: 她甚至不怎么喜欢你

translation.en: Maybe she feels weird around me because I'm the only person that knows about her nose job.
translation.zh: 也许那是因为 我是唯一知道她去整鼻子的人

translation.en: Oh, my God. Pretend you didn't hear that.
translation.zh: 天啊 你就当没听见吧

translation.en: ♪ Yo, yo, yo ♪ ♪ All you sucker MCs ♪ ♪ Ain't got nothing on me ♪
translation.zh: 你们这些人 还不知道我的厉害

translation.en: ♪ From my grades to my lines ♪ ♪ You can't touch Kevin G ♪
translation.zh: 从里到外 我都让你们望尘莫及

translation.en: ♪ I'm a Mathlete So nerd is inferred ♪
translation.zh: 我是数学天才

translation.en: ♪ But forget what you heard I'm like James Bond III ♪
translation.zh: 除此之外 我还是詹姆斯庞德三世

translation.en: ♪ Shaken not stirred I'm Kevin Gnapoor ♪
translation.zh: 酒要摇不要搅 我是凯文纳普

translation.en: ♪ The G is silent When I sneak in your door ♪
translation.zh: 我会静悄悄溜进你家门

translation.en: ♪ And make love to your woman On the bathroom floor ♪
translation.zh: 和你的女人在浴室里缠绵

translation.en: ♪ I don't play it like Shaggy You'll know it was me ♪
translation.zh: 我敢做敢当 你会知道那就是我

translation.en: ♪ Because the next time You see her she'll be like ♪ ♪ Oh, Kevin G! ♪
translation.zh: 当你下次再见到她时 她会大叫凯文Ｇ

translation.en: [Mr. Duvall] Thank you, Kevin, that's enough.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 凯文 够了

translation.en: Happy holidays, everybody.
translation.zh: 祝佳节愉快

translation.en: [Mr. Duvall] K.G. and the Power of Three. That was something.
translation.zh: 谢谢凯文和三人行 的确很不错

translation.en: Does it bother you that they still use your original choreography?
translation.zh: 你会因为 他们采用你编的舞而不快吗？

translation.en: Shut up. Damn.
translation.zh: -别说了 -可恶

translation.en: What? I'd rather see you out there shaking that thang.
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -我倒想看你在上面摇

translation.en: Uh, Gretchen, switch sides with Cady. But I'm always on your left.
translation.zh: -葛瑞珍 和凯蒂换位置 -但我一直都是在你左边的

translation.en: Well, that was when there were three of us, and now the tallest go in the middle.
translation.zh: 那时只有三个人 现在最高的人要在中间

translation.en: But the whole dance will be backwards. I'm always on your left.
translation.zh: 这样舞步会错乱 我一直都是在你左边的

translation.en: And right now you're getting on my last nerve. Switch.
translation.zh: 你别把我惹毛了 快点换

translation.en: [Mr. Duvall] And finally, please welcome to the stage, Santa's Helpers doing "Jingle Bell Rock."
translation.zh: 最后 欢迎圣诞天使们 带来的圣诞铃声响

translation.en: Jason?
translation.zh: 杰森

translation.en: ♪ What a bright time It's the right time ♪
translation.zh: 此刻美好 此刻要让

translation.en: -♪ To rock the night away ♪ -♪ To rock the night away ♪
translation.zh: 今晚震撼

translation.en: ♪ Jingle bell time Is a swell time ♪
translation.zh: 铃儿叮当 我心澎湃

translation.en: ♪ To go riding In a one-horse sleigh ♪
translation.zh: 骑上单马雪橇

translation.en: ♪ Giddyap jingle horse Pick up your feet ♪
translation.zh: 策马扬鞭 加快脚步

translation.en: ♪ Jingle around the clock ♪
translation.zh: 响彻不停

translation.en: ♪ Mix and mingle In a jingling beat ♪
translation.zh: 交汇融合 欢乐节拍

translation.en: ♪ That's the jingle bell ♪ ♪ That's the jingle bell ♪
translation.zh: 这就是铃儿响叮当

translation.en: ♪ That's the jingle bell rock ♪
translation.zh: 这就是叮当摇滚

translation.en: That was the best it ever went!
translation.zh: -真是太精彩了 -太棒了

translation.en: -That was awesome. -Ah. Lip gloss.
translation.zh: -真是太精彩了 -太棒了 -小心我的唇膏 -表现得很好 非洲女

translation.en: -Hey, good job, Africa. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -小心我的唇膏 -表现得很好 非洲女 -谢谢 -凯蒂脸红了

translation.en: [Gretchen] Cady's blushing.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -凯蒂脸红了

translation.en: Oh, my God. You totally have a crush on that guy. No, I don't.
translation.zh: -你喜欢那个男生 -不 才没有

translation.en: That's why you wanted to join the Mathletes. Mathletes? You hate math.
translation.zh: -所以你才加入数学竞赛小组 -数学竞赛？你讨厌数学

translation.en: [Gretchen] Look how red she is. You love him. And he totally complimented you. That is so fetch.
translation.zh: 你看她脸红成那样 你爱上他了 那可真炫

translation.en: Gretchen, stop trying to make "fetch" happen. It's not going to happen.
translation.zh: 别再炫来炫去的了 那是不可能的

translation.en: "Why should Caesar get to stomp around like a giant
translation.zh: 凯撒为何总是重重跺步

translation.en: while the rest of us try not to get smushed under his big feet?
translation.zh: 而我们却忙着躲避他的践踏

translation.en: What's so great about Caesar? Hmm? Brutus is just as cute as Caesar.
translation.zh: 凯撒因何而伟大 布鲁图也并不差

translation.en: Okay, Brutus is just as smart as Caesar. People totally like Brutus just as much as they like Caesar.
translation.zh: 人们喜爱布鲁图与凯撒无分轩轾

translation.en: And when did it become okay for one person to be the boss of everybody? Huh? Because that's not what Rome is about!
translation.zh: 从何时开始 一人竟可成为众人的领导者

translation.en: [shouts] We should totally just stab Caesar!"
translation.zh: 我们应该刺杀凯撒

translation.en: [Cady] Gretchen Wieners had cracked.
translation.zh: 葛瑞珍温纳已经被踢爆了

translation.en: Okay, if you even knew how mean she really is.
translation.zh: 如果你知道她有多坏…

translation.en: You know that I'm not allowed to wear hoop earrings, right?
translation.zh: 我甚至连环状耳环都不能戴

translation.en: Yeah. Two years ago, she told me that hoop earrings were her thing, and that I wasn't allowed to wear them anymore.
translation.zh: 两年前 她告诉我环状耳环是她的专利

translation.en: And then, for Hanukkah, my parents got me this pair of really expensive white-gold hoops.
translation.zh: 我父母在犹太光明节时 送了我一对昂贵的白金耳环

translation.en: And I had to pretend like I didn't even like them,
translation.zh: 我还必须装出不喜欢的样子 这真是太可悲了

translation.en: [gasps] And you know she cheats on Aaron?
translation.zh: 她也欺骗艾朗？

translation.en: Yes. Every Thursday he thinks she's doing SAT prep.
translation.zh: 他以为她每星期四 都在准备学业能力倾向测验

translation.en: But really, she's hooking up with Shane Oman in the projection room above the auditorium,
translation.zh: 但其实她是在放映室 和尚恩欧曼厮混

translation.en: and I never told anybody that, because I'm such a good friend.
translation.zh: 这些我从没向人透露过 因为我是忠实的朋友

translation.en: [Cady] Jackpot. Gretchen's secret had put the plan back in motion.
translation.zh: 就是这个 这个秘密终于让计划得以实现

translation.en: After Christmas break, we tried every Thursday to help Aaron catch Regina in the act.
translation.zh: 圣诞假期过后 我们要让艾朗直接逮到瑞吉娜

translation.en: Hey. Hey, what's up?
translation.zh: -你好 -你好

translation.en: My purse!
translation.zh: 我的皮包

translation.en: Looks like he's headed for the projection room above the auditorium!
translation.zh: 看样子他朝放映室的方向跑了

translation.en: [Aaron] Coach Carr?
translation.zh: 卡尔教练

translation.en: Trang Pak?
translation.zh: 白川

translation.en: Guys, why did we think we could do this? We're amateurs. No, we just have to regroup. Think outside our box.
translation.zh: -我们太外行了 -我们需要重拟计划

translation.en: What are Kalteen bars? They're these weird Swedish nutrition bars.
translation.zh: -卡尔汀棒是什么？ -一种瑞典滋养食品

translation.en: My mom used to give them to the kids in Africa to help them gain weight.
translation.zh: 我妈常分发给非洲儿童吃 好让他们增加重量

translation.en: They're these weird nutrition bars my mom uses to lose weight.
translation.zh: 这是我妈用来减肥的健康食品

translation.en: Give me it.
translation.zh: 我吃吃看

translation.en: It's all in, like, Swedish or something.
translation.zh: 上面好像都是瑞典文

translation.en: Yeah, you know, there's some weird ingredient in them that's not legal in the U.S. yet.
translation.zh: 里面有些成分在美国是禁用的

translation.en: -Ephedrine? -No.
translation.zh: -麻黄素？ -不是

translation.en: -Phentermine. -No.
translation.zh: -酚三胺 -不是

translation.en: It burns carbs. It just burns up all your carbs.
translation.zh: 它可以燃烧碳水化合物 将你体内的醣类燃烧殆尽

translation.en: I really wanna lose three pounds.
translation.zh: 我真的想再减三磅

translation.en: Oh, my God, what are you talking about? You're so skinny.
translation.zh: -你在说什么？ -你已经很瘦了

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.zh: 别吵

translation.en: Yes. [Cady] The weird thing about hanging out with Regina
translation.zh: 真奇怪 和瑞吉娜在一起

translation.en: was that I could hate her, and at the same time, I still wanted her to like me.
translation.zh: 我一方面恨她 一方面又希望她喜欢我

translation.en: Okay. You have really good eyebrows.
translation.zh: -你的眉毛很漂亮 -谢谢

translation.en: -Thanks. -Move.
translation.zh: -你的眉毛很漂亮 -谢谢 葛瑞珍也一样

translation.en: Same with Gretchen. The meaner Regina was to her,
translation.zh: 葛瑞珍也一样 瑞吉娜对她越坏 她就越想讨好瑞吉娜

translation.en: the more Gretchen tried to win Regina back.
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜对她越坏 她就越想讨好瑞吉娜

translation.en: She knew it was better to be in The Plastics, hating life than to not be in at all.
translation.zh: 她知道成为塑胶一族的一员 总也强过什么都不是

translation.en: Because being with The Plastics was like being famous.
translation.zh: 因为和塑胶一族一起 就会出尽风头

translation.en: People looked at you all the time, and everybody just knew stuff about you.
translation.zh: 人们随时都在注意你 也都在谈论你的事

translation.en: That new girl moved here from Africa. I saw Cady Heron wearing Army pants and flip-flops,
translation.zh: -那新来的女孩刚从非洲回来 -凯蒂哈朗穿军人裤

translation.en: so I bought Army pants and flip-flops.
translation.zh: 所以我也去买了军人裤

translation.en: That Cady girl is hot. She might even be hotter than Regina George.
translation.zh: 那个叫凯蒂的女孩很正点 说不定比瑞吉娜乔治还正点

translation.en: I hear Regina George is dating Aaron Samuels again.
translation.zh: 听说瑞吉娜又跟艾朗约会了

translation.en: The two were seen canoodling at Chris Eisel's Halloween party.
translation.zh: 有人看到他们两人 在万圣节舞会上相拥在一起

translation.en: They've been inseparable ever since.
translation.zh: 之后就难分难舍了

translation.en: [Cady] I was a woman possessed. I spent about 80% of my time talking about Regina.
translation.zh: 我也不由自主的 有80%的时间都在谈论瑞吉娜

translation.en: And the other 20% of the time, I was praying for someone else to bring her up so I could talk about her more.
translation.zh: 其他的20%时间 我则期望有人能提起她

translation.en: She's not even that good-looking if you really look at her.
translation.zh: 她甚至并不怎么好看

translation.en: I don't know. Now that she's getting fatter, she's got pretty big jugs.
translation.zh: 现在她越来越胖 胸部越来越大

translation.en: I could hear people getting bored with me. But I couldn't stop. It just kept coming up like word vomit.
translation.zh: 人们对我逐渐失去兴趣 但我就是忍不住想吐吐毒舌

translation.en: I have this theory that if you cut all her hair off, she'd look like a British man.
translation.zh: 如果你把她的头发剃光 她看起来就像英国男人

translation.en: Yeah, I know. You told me that one before. Oh. Hey, I'm having an art show.
translation.zh: 对 你之前说过了 我要开艺术展了

translation.en: So, why don't you take a night off from your double life. I want you to see it.
translation.zh: 找一个晚上 脱离双面间谍身分过来看看

translation.en: Coolness.
translation.zh: 酷死

translation.en: What is that smell? Oh, Regina gave me some perfume.
translation.zh: -这是什么味道？ -瑞吉娜给了我些香水

translation.en: You smell like a baby prostitute. Thanks.
translation.zh: -你闻起来像个小妓女 -谢谢你

translation.en: Meanwhile, I was finding any excuse I could to talk to Aaron.
translation.zh: 在此同时 我找尽借口和艾朗攀谈

translation.en: I don't get this. Do you get any of this?
translation.zh: -这我不懂 你懂吗？ -考得很好 凯蒂

translation.en: Nice job, Cady.
translation.zh: -这我不懂 你懂吗？ -考得很好 凯蒂 （微分方程考试 98分）

translation.en: Kind of seems like you get it.
translation.zh: 看来你很懂

translation.en: If I was gonna keep this going, I was gonna have to really commit.
translation.zh: 如果我想继续和他交谈 就必须想个办法

translation.en: [Ms. Norbury] Not your best.
translation.zh: 这次不太好

translation.en: Damn, Africa, what happened? How'd you do?
translation.zh: -怎么回事？非洲女 -你考得如何？

translation.en: Not so good. You know, I think I need a tutor.
translation.zh: 不太好 我可能需要一位家教

translation.en: I'll tutor you, if you ever wanna get together after school or something.
translation.zh: 我可以在下课后留下来教你

translation.en: Do you think Regina would mind? No. You guys are friends.
translation.zh: -瑞吉娜介不介意？ -不会 你们是朋友

translation.en: Well, maybe we just won't tell her.
translation.zh: 也许我们最好不要告诉她

translation.en: [Cady] So, what did you get for this one? Well, the first time I did it, I got a zero.
translation.zh: -这题的答案是什么？ -我第一次的答案是零

translation.en: -[Cady] Wrong. -But then when I checked it, I got
translation.zh: -错 -我回头检查时答案是一

translation.en: -one. -There you go. I got one, too.
translation.zh: 答对了 我的答案也是一

translation.en: Yeah, you have to check it because sometimes the product of two negative integers is a positive number.
translation.zh: 再检查一次 因为负负可能得正

translation.en: Yeah, like negative four and negative six.
translation.zh: 对 就像负四乘负六

translation.en: That's right. That's good.
translation.zh: 没错 很好

translation.en: Well, you're a good tutor.
translation.zh: 你是个好家教

translation.en: Man, um, look, I, I can't do this. It's not fair to Regina.
translation.zh: 我不能这么做 这样对瑞吉娜不公平

translation.en: Why do you like her? Look, I know she can be really mean sometimes, but--
translation.zh: -你为什么喜欢她？ -我知道她有时很坏

translation.en: Then why do you like her? -Why do you? -But--
translation.zh: -那你为何喜欢她？ -那你呢？

translation.en: Look, there's good and bad to everybody. Right? Regina's just... She's just more upfront about it.
translation.zh: 每个人都有好有坏 瑞吉娜只是表现得比较明显

translation.en: [Cady] Oh, no. It was coming up. The word vomit. I didn't mean to say it, but--
translation.zh: 糟了 我的毒舌又要出现了

translation.en: She's cheating on you!
translation.zh: 她背叛你

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Did he say why?
translation.zh: 他有说明原因吗？

translation.en: Somebody told him about Shane Oman. [Karen] Who?
translation.zh: -有人告诉他尚恩的事 -是谁？

translation.en: [Regina] He said some guy on the baseball team. Baseball team?
translation.zh: -棒球队的人 -棒球队？

translation.en: I gave him everything. I was half a virgin when I met him.
translation.zh: 我什么都给了他 我认识他之前还算半个处女

translation.en: You wanna do something fun? You wanna go to Taco Bell?
translation.zh: 要不要找点乐子？ 想不想去墨西哥速食店

translation.en: I can't go to Taco Bell, I'm on an all-carb diet. God, Karen, you are so stupid!
translation.zh: 我不能去墨西哥速食店 我正在吃减肥餐 你这个笨蛋

translation.en: Regina, wait. Talk to me. [Regina] Nobody understands me.
translation.zh: -瑞吉娜 你可以跟我谈 -没有人了解我

translation.en: You're not stupid, Karen. No. I am, actually.
translation.zh: -你一点都不笨 凯伦 -不 我真的很笨

translation.en: I'm failing almost everything.
translation.zh: 我什么事都做不好

translation.en: Well, there must be something you're good at.
translation.zh: 你一定有拿手的事

translation.en: I can put my whole fist in my mouth. Wanna see?
translation.zh: 我可以把整个拳头放进嘴巴里 想不想看？

translation.en: No. That's okay.
translation.zh: 不用 没关系

translation.en: Anything else?
translation.zh: 还有没有别的？

translation.en: I'm kind of psychic. I have a fifth sense.
translation.zh: 我能通点灵 我有第五感

translation.en: What do you mean? It's like I have ESPN or something.
translation.zh: -什么意思？ -就是我会有一些特殊的感应

translation.en: My breasts can always tell when it's gonna rain.
translation.zh: 我的胸部能预知何时会下雨

translation.en: Really? That's amazing.
translation.zh: 真的？那太神奇了

translation.en: Well, they can tell when it's raining.
translation.zh: 它们在下雨时会有特别感应

translation.en: [Cady] I have to admit, I was mildly horrified when Aaron didn't immediately ask me to be his girlfriend.
translation.zh: 我有点生气 艾朗并没有找我当他的女友

translation.en: I mean, I know he was sad, but how much time did he need? Regina had moved on.
translation.zh: 他到底需要多少时间恢复？ 瑞吉娜早就另结新欢了

translation.en: Do you guys need anything? Some snacks? A condom?
translation.zh: 你们需要什么吗？ 零食还是保险套？

translation.en: Let me know. Oh, God love you.
translation.zh: 尽管吩咐 神爱你们

translation.en: But overall, the plan was going pretty well.
translation.zh: （春季狂欢的国王和皇后投票） 计划进行得很顺利 艾朗甩了瑞吉娜

translation.en: Aaron had dumped Regina, and she was unknowingly
translation.zh: 计划进行得很顺利 艾朗甩了瑞吉娜 她毫不知情的 一天吃下5000卡路里的食物

translation.en: eating 5,000 calories a day.
translation.zh: 她毫不知情的 一天吃下5000卡路里的食物

translation.en: It was time to turn our attention to the army of skanks.
translation.zh: 该回头看看跟屁虫的状况了

translation.en: [woman on TV] And finally, the nominees for Spring Fling Queen are as follows,
translation.zh: 以下是春季狂欢皇后的候选人名单

translation.en: Regina George.
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜乔治

translation.en: Gretchen Wieners.
translation.zh: 葛瑞珍温纳

translation.en: Janis Ian. What is happening to the world?
translation.zh: -詹妮丝伊恩 -这世界是怎么了？

translation.en: And the final nominee... I couldn't help myself. It was so easy.
translation.zh: -最后一位候选人是… -我实在忍不住

translation.en: ...is Cady Heron.
translation.zh: 凯蒂哈朗

translation.en: Damian, you put me in there, too? That's not part of the plan. I didn't put you in there.
translation.zh: -达米安 你竟把我放进去？ -不是我放的

translation.en: You mean I'm really nominated?
translation.zh: 你是说我是真的被提名？

translation.en: [Cady] In January, Regina had put a Spring Fling dress on hold at a store called 1-3-5.
translation.zh: 一月时 瑞吉娜在一家 135服饰店预订了礼服

translation.en: But being Plastic, she needed our advice before she could actually buy it.
translation.zh: 但依规定 在买之前 她必须先征询我们的意见

translation.en: [Regina] Can someone zip me up?
translation.zh: 谁来帮我拉上拉链

translation.en: It won't close. It's a five.
translation.zh: -拉不上去 -这件是五号的

translation.en: Okay, it must be marked wrong. Cady, all I've been eating are these Kalteen bars. They suck.
translation.zh: -它一定是标错尺码了 -凯蒂 卡尔汀棒根本没效

translation.en: No, no, this is just how they work. This is all your water weight.
translation.zh: 不 本来就会这样 那是你体内的水分过多

translation.en: First you bloat, and then you drop ten pounds like that...
translation.zh: 一开始会肿胀 然后就会一下掉10磅

translation.en: Well, the Kalteen bars have burned up all your carbs, and now your body's just running on water.
translation.zh: 你已燃烧了所有的碳水化合物 现在会开始积水

translation.en: But once the water's gone, then you'll be all muscle. It explains it all on the label.
translation.zh: 水分排除后全身就只剩下肌肉 标签上是这么写的

translation.en: You know Swedish? Yeah, everyone in Africa can read Swedish.
translation.zh: -你看得懂瑞典文？ -所有非洲人都懂得瑞典文

translation.en: Ma'am, do you have this in the next size up? Sorry. We only carry sizes one, three, and five.
translation.zh: -你还有大一点的尺码吗？ -抱歉 我们只有1、3、5号

translation.en: You could try Sears.
translation.zh: 你可以去西尔斯百货找找

translation.en: [Ms. Norbury] Cady. I need your parents to sign this
translation.zh: 凯蒂 请你父母在上面签名 好让他们知道你不及格

translation.en: so they know that you're failing.
translation.zh: 凯蒂 请你父母在上面签名 好让他们知道你不及格 （58分 不及格）

translation.en: Failing?
translation.zh: 不及格？

translation.en: You know what's weird about your quizzes, Cady, is that all the work is right and just the answers are wrong.
translation.zh: 最奇怪的是过程都没错 但答案却不对

translation.en: -Really? -Really.
translation.zh: -真的？ -没错

translation.en: Cady, I know that having a boyfriend may seem like the most important thing in the world right now,
translation.zh: 凯蒂 我知道交男朋友 在这时候也许很重要

translation.en: but you don't have to dumb yourself down to get guys to like you.
translation.zh: 但你犯不着为了他 而故意让自己变笨

translation.en: -[Cady] How would you know? -I know, "How would I know," right?
translation.zh: -你怎么会知道？ -我怎么会知道的吗？

translation.en: I'm divorced. I'm broke from getting divorced.
translation.zh: 我离了婚 离婚让我一文不名

translation.en: The only guy that ever calls my house is Randy from Chase Visa. And you know why?
translation.zh: 唯一致电给我的男生是大通 信用卡公司的蓝迪 为什么？

translation.en: Because I'm a pusher. I push people.
translation.zh: 因为我是个督促高手 我很会鞭策人

translation.en: I pushed my husband into law school. That was a bust.
translation.zh: 我鞭策我先生进法学院

translation.en: I pushed myself into working three jobs. And now I'm gonna push you,
translation.zh: 我鞭策我自己同时兼三份差 现在我要来鞭策你

translation.en: because I know you're smarter than this.
translation.zh: -我知道你的才智不只如此 -谢谢

translation.en: Thanks, Ms. Norbury. And if there's anything I can do
translation.zh: -我知道你的才智不只如此 -谢谢 有什么需要我效劳的尽管吩咐

translation.en: for extra credit, please let me know.
translation.zh: 有什么需要我效劳的尽管吩咐

translation.en: Oh, I will.
translation.zh: 我会的

translation.en: I hate her! I mean, she's totally failing me on purpose because I didn't join those stupid Mathletes!
translation.zh: 我恨她 她故意让我不及格 因为我没有加入数学竞赛小组

translation.en: She was so queer. She was like, "I'm a pusher, Cady. I'm a pusher."
translation.zh: 她真的很古怪 什么“我很会鞭策人”

translation.en: What does that even mean?
translation.zh: -这是什么意思？ -毒贩吗？

translation.en: -Like a drug pusher? -Probably.
translation.zh: -这是什么意思？ -毒贩吗？ 说不定 她说她兼了三份差

translation.en: She said she works three jobs.
translation.zh: 说不定 她说她兼了三份差

translation.en: You know, I bet she sells drugs on the side to pay for her pathetic divorce.
translation.zh: 我猜她贩毒以支付离婚费用

translation.en: You let it out, honey. Put it in the book.
translation.zh: 把它宣泄出来 写上去

translation.en: [Cady] I know it may look like I'd become a bitch, but that's only because I was acting like a bitch.
translation.zh: 看起来我快成为她们那一挂了 但其实我只是在演戏

translation.en: [Janis] Hey, I called you last night. How come you didn't call me back? Oh, I got busy. Sorry.
translation.zh: -你昨晚为何没给我电话？ -我抽不出空 对不起

translation.en: So, you need a ride to my art show this weekend?
translation.zh: 你这个周末 要不要一起去看我的展览？

translation.en: No. I have to go to Madison with my parents. I'm so sorry. [sighs]
translation.zh: 我要和父母去麦迪逊 抱歉

translation.en: Well, you wanna watch a movie tonight? Can't. I'm doing major Plastic sabotage tonight.
translation.zh: -你今晚想去看电影吗？ -不行 今晚有破坏计划

translation.en: But we don't have anything planned for tonight.
translation.zh: 但我们今天没有破坏计划

translation.en: Oh, I planned this one on my own. Love you. Bye.
translation.zh: 这是我自己的计划 再见

translation.en: Gretchen thinks you're mad at her because she's running for Spring Fling Queen.
translation.zh: 葛瑞珍认为你生她的气 因为她也想角逐狂欢皇后

translation.en: Oh, my God, I'm not mad at her. I'm worried about her.
translation.zh: 我没生她的气 我反倒很担心她

translation.en: I think somebody nominated her as a joke or something. And when nobody votes for her,
translation.zh: 我认为有人故意整她 没有人会投票给她的

translation.en: she's gonna have a total meltdown. And who's gonna have to take care of her? Me.
translation.zh: 她一定会深受打击 到时谁来照顾她？只有我

translation.en: So you don't think anyone will vote for her?
translation.zh: 你不认为有人会投票给她？

translation.en: Cady, she's not pretty. I mean, that sounds bad, but whatever.
translation.zh: 凯蒂 她长得不好看 这么说很毒 但是事实

translation.en: The Spring Fling Queen is always pretty.
translation.zh: 春季狂欢皇后总是最美的女生当选

translation.en: And the crazy thing is is that it should be Karen, but people forget about her because she's such a slut.
translation.zh: 本来应该是凯伦 但因为她是烂货所以没人理她

translation.en: Anyway, I gotta go. I'm going to bed.
translation.zh: 总之 我该上床了

translation.en: Well, she's not mad at you. Hold on.
translation.zh: -你看 她没生你的气 -等一下

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Shh.
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: -Hello? -If someone said something bad about you,
translation.zh: 你好 如果有人说你坏话 你不会想听吧

translation.en: you'd want me to tell you, right?
translation.zh: 如果有人说你坏话 你不会想听吧

translation.en: No. What if it was someone you thought was your friend?
translation.zh: -不想 -如果是朋友说的呢？

translation.en: -What are you-- -[phone beeps] Hold on. Other line. -[Gretchen] I'm not taking this anymore. -Good for you, Gretch.
translation.zh: -什么？等等 有电话进来 -我不会再说了

translation.en: -[Karen] Hello? -[Regina] Let's go out.
translation.zh: -你好 -我们出去一下

translation.en: Okay. Hold on. I'm on the other line with Gretchen. Don't invite Gretchen. She's driving me nuts.
translation.zh: -葛瑞珍在另一线上 -别找她 她快把我逼疯了

translation.en: -Hold on. -Okay, hurry up.
translation.zh: -等一下 -好 快点

translation.en: It's Regina. She wants to hang out with me tonight, but she told me not to tell you. Do not hang out with her.
translation.zh: -是瑞吉娜 她想找我出去 -别跟她出去

translation.en: Why? You don't want me to tell you.
translation.zh: -为什么？ -你不想我告诉你

translation.en: Ugh, you can tell me. Hold on.
translation.zh: 你可以跟我说 稍等一下

translation.en: Oh, my God, she's so annoying. Who is?
translation.zh: -天啊 她真的好烦 -谁？

translation.en: Who's this? Gretchen.
translation.zh: -你是谁？ -葛瑞珍

translation.en: Right. Hold on.
translation.zh: 对 等一下

translation.en: Oh, my God, she's so annoying. I know. Just get rid of her.
translation.zh: -天啊 她真的好烦 -我知道 快打发她

translation.en: Okay. What is it? Regina says everyone hates you because you're such a slut.
translation.zh: -好 她说什么？ -瑞吉娜说你是烂货

translation.en: She said that? You didn't hear it from me.
translation.zh: -她真的这么说？ -别说是我说的

translation.en: Little harsh, Gretch. Whatever. She has a right to know.
translation.zh: -这有点太狠了 -她有权知道

translation.en: I can't go out. I'm sick.
translation.zh: 我不能出去…我不太舒服

translation.en: Boo. You whore.
translation.zh: 你这个贱货

translation.en: Regina, we have to talk to you. Is butter a carb?
translation.zh: -瑞吉娜 我们有话跟你说 -奶油是碳水化合物吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: Regina, you're wearing sweatpants. It's Monday.
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜 你穿了休闲裤 而今天是星期一

translation.en: So? So that's against the rules, and you can't sit with us.
translation.zh: -那又怎样？ -这违反规定

translation.en: Whatever. Those rules aren't real. They were real that day I wore a vest.
translation.zh: -管他的 何必这么认真 -但我穿背心那天你就很认真

translation.en: Because that vest was disgusting. You can't sit with us!
translation.zh: -因为那件背心很难看 -你不能和我们坐在一起

translation.en: These sweatpants are all that fits me right now.
translation.zh: 我现在只穿得下休闲裤

translation.en: Fine. You can walk home, bitches.
translation.zh: 好 你们自己走路回家 贱人

translation.en: Watch where you're going,fat-ass!
translation.zh: 走路小心点 大屁股

translation.en: [Cady] Gretchen and Karen followed me around all afternoon.
translation.zh: 葛瑞珍和凯伦整个下午都跟着我

translation.en: So, what are we doing this weekend? [Karen] Yeah, what are we doing? Oh, I have to go to Madison with my parents.
translation.zh: -这个周末有什么打算？ -我要和父母去麦迪逊

translation.en: We have tickets for this thing. -What? -What?
translation.zh: -我们要去看演唱会 -什么？

translation.en: [Cady] Was I the new queen bee?
translation.zh: 我成为新的女王蜂了吗？

translation.en: I can try and get out of it. -Yeah. -Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: -我试试看能不能抽身 -好

translation.en: Because I told my friend Janis I'd go to her art show. We've had these tickets for months.
translation.zh: -我要去看詹妮丝的展览 -但我们几个月前就订好票了

translation.en: You love Ladysmith Black Mambazo. But she's my friend, and I made her a promise.
translation.zh: -你很喜欢曼波合唱团 -但我答应詹妮丝了

translation.en: I think Cady's old enough to spend one night on her own.
translation.zh: 我想凯蒂够大了 能自己一个人在家过夜的

translation.en: [Cady] I had learned how to control everyone around me.
translation.zh: 我已学会了如何控制身边的每个人

translation.en: Hey. I'm having a small get-together at my house tomorrow night.
translation.zh: 我明天要办个小型聚会

translation.en: Is Regina going? Ugh. No. Do you think I'm an idiot?
translation.zh: -瑞吉娜也会去吗？ -不会 你以为我有那么笨吗

translation.en: No, it's just gonna be a few cool people, and you better be one of them, byotch.
translation.zh: 我只邀了一些很不错的人 希望你也是其中之一

translation.en: Fine, I'll go. Shut up. I love that shirt on you.
translation.zh: -好 我会去 -真的 你穿这件衬衫很好看

translation.en: [Cady] Aaron Samuels was going to be in my house, at my party.
translation.zh: 艾朗山缪会来参加我的派对

translation.en: Everything had to be perfect.
translation.zh: 每件事都要尽善尽美

translation.en: And this time, when Aaron saw me, I wouldn't be caught in some ridiculous costume.
translation.zh: 这次当艾朗看到我时 我不会再打扮得稀奇古怪

translation.en: Hey, guys. [both] You look awesome!
