translation.zh: -你们好 -你看起来真美

translation.en: I know, right?
translation.zh: 不错吧

translation.en: Okay, so I got enough cheese and crackers for eight people. Do you think that's enough?
translation.zh: 我准备了八人份的乳酪和饼干 这样够不够？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah. Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -够了 -对

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [Cady] It was not enough. Somehow, the word had gotten out about my small get-together.
translation.zh: 但显然不够 我的小聚会风声很快的走漏

translation.en: Jason is here with Taylor Wedell. He's just using her to make you mad.
translation.zh: -杰森和泰勒一起来 -他只是利用她来刺激你

translation.en: Have you guys seen Aaron yet? -Mmm-mmm. -No.
translation.zh: -你看到艾朗了吗？ -没有

translation.en: Dude, put on "The Ramayana Monkey Chant."
translation.zh: 老兄 放那首《罗摩衍那猴子颂》

translation.en: Do I know you? Deek! What up, dog?
translation.zh: -我认识你吗？ -你好

translation.en: She thinks she's gonna have a party and not invite me? Who does she think she is?
translation.zh: 她敢不邀请我？她以为她是谁

translation.en: You're right, hon. I, like, invented her, you know what I mean? Ugh!
translation.zh: -你说得没错 -她是我一手塑造出来的

translation.en: [Gretchen] Jason. I have to talk to you.
translation.zh: 杰森 我有话跟你说

translation.en: [Taylor] Whatever.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -[Gretchen] I love you. -[Jason] I know, I know.
translation.zh: -我爱你 -我知道…

translation.en: -Hey! Put that down! -Here you go.
translation.zh: 把它放下

translation.en: [Cady] Was Aaron blowing me off?
translation.zh: 艾朗放我鸽子吗？

translation.en: What's up? Gretchen came to talk to me.
translation.zh: 怎么回事？葛瑞珍跑来找我谈

translation.en: -[Cady] Oh, no. -Look, I don't wanna hurt your feelings, but I only date women of color.
translation.zh: 我无意伤害你的感情 但我只和有色女人交往

translation.en: I have to pee.
translation.zh: 失陪一下

translation.en: Get out.
translation.zh: 给我出去

translation.en: Oh, ow.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey. I've been looking for you everywhere. Me too.
translation.zh: -我到处找你 -我也是

translation.en: Wow. You look, um... New clothes?
translation.zh: 你看起来…这是新衣服吗？

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You wanna go downstairs? No, no. Let's stay here.
translation.zh: -想不想下楼？ -不 我们留在这里好了

translation.en: Thanks for getting me to come out tonight. Yeah, sure, no problem.
translation.zh: -谢谢你邀我出来 -不客气

translation.en: I wasted too much time being pissed off at Regina. No more liars.
translation.zh: 我在瑞吉娜身上浪费太多时间 我再也不想被骗了

translation.en: I would never lie to you. I know, I know.
translation.zh: -我绝不会骗你 -我知道

translation.en: Although... [giggles] Okay, listen. I mean, I did lie to you once, but you're totally gonna laugh when I tell you, so--
translation.zh: 但…我曾撒了点谎 我说出来后你会笑我

translation.en: Tell me what?
translation.zh: 你说说看

translation.en: I pretended to be bad at math so that you'd help me.
translation.zh: 我故意表现出数学不好 好让你教我

translation.en: But the thing is, I'm not really bad at math. I'm actually really good at math.
translation.zh: 但其实我数学不差 事实上我数学相当好

translation.en: You're kind of bad at math. Anyways, now I'm failing. Isn't that funny?
translation.zh: 但你数学不好 所以 反正我已经不及格了

translation.en: Wait. You're failing on purpose? That's stupid.
translation.zh: 你故意不及格？这太蠢了

translation.en: No. Not on purpose. Just, you know... I just wanted a reason to talk to you.
translation.zh: 也不是故意 我只是想找个借口跟你讲话

translation.en: So why didn't you just talk to me? Well, because I couldn't. Because of Regina.
translation.zh: -你何不直接找我讲话？ -我不能 因为瑞吉娜

translation.en: Because you were her property--
translation.zh: -你是她的财产 -她的财产？

translation.en: -Her property? -No. Shut up. Not her property--
translation.zh: -你是她的财产 -她的财产？ -不是 闭嘴… -别叫我闭嘴

translation.en: -No, don't tell me to shut up. -I wasn't--
translation.zh: -不是 闭嘴… -别叫我闭嘴

translation.en: God, you know what? You are just like a clone of Regina.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？你就像是瑞吉娜的翻版

translation.en: Oh, no, no, listen to me. You're not listening to me...
translation.zh: 不…听我解释

translation.en: [Cady] Oh, no. It was coming up again. Word vomit. No, wait a minute--
translation.zh: 糟了 我又想吐毒舌了 不 等一等…

translation.en: What is this? -Actual vomit. -[vomits]
translation.zh: -怎么回事？ -我真的吐了

translation.en: [Cady] Aaron!
translation.zh: 艾朗

translation.en: Aaron, wait! Just...
translation.zh: 艾朗 等等

translation.en: Okay. Call me.
translation.zh: 好吧 再给我电话

translation.en: -Oh, God. -You dirty little liar.
translation.zh: -糟了 -你这个小骗子

translation.en: I'm sorry. I can explain. Explain how you forgot to invite us to your party?
translation.zh: -抱歉 请听我解释 -说你忘了邀请我们？

translation.en: Janis, I cannot stop this car. I have a curfew. You know I couldn't invite you. I had to pretend to be Plastic.
translation.zh: -我不能停车 我有宵禁 -我必须假装成塑胶一族

translation.en: [scoffs] Hey, buddy, you're not pretending anymore. You're Plastic.
translation.zh: 不用再装了 你已经是塑胶一族了

translation.en: Cold, shiny, hard Plastic. [Damian] Curfew, 1:00 a.m. It is now 1:10.
translation.zh: -冷酷耀眼又无情的塑胶一族 -超过宵禁 现在已经1点10分了

translation.en: Did you have an awesome time? Did you drink awesome shooters and listen to awesome music,
translation.zh: 你是否玩得愉快 喝得尽兴？

translation.en: and then just sit around and soak up each other's awesomeness?
translation.zh: 并且吸取所有人的光芒？

translation.en: You know what? You're the one who made me like this so you could use me for your eighth-grade revenge.
translation.zh: 是你利用我为你报八年级的仇 才害我今天变成这样

translation.en: God! See, at least me and Regina George know we're mean.
translation.zh: 至少我和瑞吉娜知道自己很坏

translation.en: You try to act like you're so innocent.
translation.zh: 你却假装清纯

translation.en: Like, "Oh, I used to live in Africa with all the little birdies and the little monkeys."
translation.zh: 我喜欢住在非洲 与小鸟和猴子为伍

translation.en: You know what? It's not my fault you're, like, in love with me or something!
translation.zh: 你喜欢上我又不是我的错

translation.en: -What! -Oh, no, she did not! See? That is the thing with you Plastics.
translation.zh: -她才没有 -这就是塑胶一族的通病

translation.en: You think that everybody is in love with you, when, actually, everybody hates you.
translation.zh: 你以为所有人都爱你 其实他们是恨你

translation.en: Like Aaron Samuels, for example. He broke up with Regina and guess what, he still doesn't want you.
translation.zh: 艾朗山缪已和瑞吉娜分手 但他也没来找你

translation.en: So why are you still messing with Regina, Cady?
translation.zh: 那为什么 你还要和瑞吉娜混在一起？

translation.en: I'll tell you why. Because you are a mean girl! You're a bitch!
translation.zh: 因为你本性邪恶 你是个贱女人

translation.en: Here. You can have this. It won a prize.
translation.zh: 拿去 我还因此得奖

translation.en: And I want my pink shirt back! I want my pink shirt back!
translation.zh: 把我的粉红T恤衫还给我…

translation.en: Hon, slow down. It's like I can't trust anyone anymore.
translation.zh: -走慢一点 -我再也不相信任何人了

translation.en: Why are you eating a Kalteen bar? I'm starving. Man, I hate those things.
translation.zh: -你为什么吃卡尔汀棒？ -因为我很饿

translation.en: Coach Carr makes us eat those when we wanna move up a weight class.
translation.zh: 教练要我们增加体重时 都会叫我们吃这个

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: They make you gain weight like crazy.
translation.zh: 它们可以让你快速增重

translation.en: Motherf-- [spits]
translation.zh: 可恶

translation.en: This girl is the nastiest skank bitch
translation.zh: 这个女孩是我所见过的…

translation.en: I've ever met.
translation.zh: 最恶毒的贱人

translation.en: Do not trust her.
translation.zh: 别相信她

translation.en: She is a fugly slut!
translation.zh: 她是个大烂货

translation.en: I found it in the girls' bathroom. It's so mean, Mr. Duvall.
translation.zh: 我在女厕发现的 这太恶毒了 杜佛先生

translation.en: Is this true? Trang Pak made out with Coach Carr?
translation.zh: 这是真的吗？白川和卡尔教练有染

translation.en: Good Lord.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: What's that say? "Kaitlyn Caussin is a..." Fat whore.
translation.zh: -这又是什么？凯特琳是个… -肥骚货

translation.en: Okay, calm down, Miss George.
translation.zh: 好 冷静点 乔治小姐

translation.en: Why would someone write that? That's just so mean.
translation.zh: 怎么有人会这么写？这真的很恶毒

translation.en: Don't worry, we're gonna find out who did it.
translation.zh: 别担心 我们会找出是谁写的

translation.en: There's only three girls in the whole school who aren't in it.
translation.zh: 只有三个女孩不在里面

translation.en: At your age, you're gonna be having a lot of urges.
translation.zh: 在你们这个年纪 你们会有很多冲动

translation.en: You're gonna want to take off your clothes and touch each other.
translation.zh: 你们会想脱下衣服彼此触摸

translation.en: But if you do touch each other, you will get chlamydia. And die.
translation.zh: 但你们如果触摸彼此的话 就会感染衣原体并死亡

translation.en: [student] Coach Carr.
translation.zh: 卡尔教练

translation.en: Cady Heron, they wanna see you in the principal's office.
translation.zh: 凯蒂哈朗 请马上到校长室去

translation.en: All right, chlamydia. K-L-A...
translation.zh: 好 衣原体 KLA…

translation.en: In here, Miss Heron.
translation.zh: 请进 哈朗小姐

translation.en: What's going on? Have a seat, Miss Heron.
translation.zh: -发生什么事了？ -请坐 哈朗小姐

translation.en: Have you ever seen this before? [Cady] No. I mean, yes, I've seen it before, but it's not mine.
translation.zh: -你看过这个吗？ -没…我看过 但这不是我的

translation.en: You better get your story straight, Miss Heron, because I'm not messing around here.
translation.zh: 你最好说实话 我可不是在开玩笑

translation.en: It's not ours, it's Regina's. Yeah, she's trying to make it look like we wrote it, but really, she wrote it.
translation.zh: 不是我们的 是瑞吉娜的 真的 都是她写的

translation.en: Miss Wieners, why would Regina refer to herself as a "fugly slut"?
translation.zh: 温纳小姐 瑞吉娜为什么 会形容自己是“大烂货”？

translation.en: Miss Smith, this is no time to be laughing.
translation.zh: 史密斯小姐 这件事一点都不好笑

translation.en: We're gonna get to the bottom of this right now.
translation.zh: 我们必须要查清楚

translation.en: Maybe we're not in that book, because everybody likes us.
translation.zh: 也许我们不在里面 是因为我们很受欢迎

translation.en: And I don't wanna be punished for being well-liked.
translation.zh: 我不想因为太受欢迎而被处罚

translation.en: And I don't think my father, the inventor of Toaster Strudel, would be too pleased to hear about this.
translation.zh: 我父亲 烤果馅卷的发明人 不会喜欢听到这种事

translation.en: "Made out with a hot dog"? Oh, my God, that was one time!
translation.zh: 用热狗自慰 天啊 就那么一次

translation.en: "Dawn Schweitzer has a huge ass"? Who would write that?
translation.zh: “东史维则屁股超大” 这是谁写的？

translation.en: Who wouldn't write that?
translation.zh: 任谁都会这么写的

translation.en: "Trang Pak made out with Coach Carr"?
translation.zh: 白川和卡尔教练有染

translation.en: And so did Sun Jin Dinh. [laughs]
translation.zh: 孙晶婷也有

translation.en: [in Vietnamese] You little slut! [in Vietnamese] You're the slut!
translation.zh: -你这烂货 -你才是烂货

translation.en: Hey! Hey! Settle down! All right, hey.
translation.zh: 安静 别吵了

translation.en: No. You do not push and sh-- Ow!
translation.zh: 不许推挤

translation.en: [Mr. Duvall] Do you have anything else you wanna say?
translation.zh: 你们还有什么话好说？

translation.en: No, I can't answer any more questions until I have a parent or lawyer present.
translation.zh: 在我的律师到达之前 我不会回答任何问题的

translation.en: [sighs] Miss Smith?
translation.zh: 史密斯小姐？

translation.en: Whoever wrote it probably didn't think anyone would ever see it?
translation.zh: 不管那是谁写的 我不认为有人曾经看过

translation.en: I hope that nobody else ever does see it.
translation.zh: 我希望真的没有人看过

translation.en: Mom, can you pick me up? I'm scared.
translation.zh: 妈 你能不能来接我？我好害怕

translation.en: -"Janis Ian, dyke"? -Oh, that's original.
translation.zh: -詹妮丝伊恩是女同性恋 -了无新意

translation.en: -"Too gay to function"? -Hey! That's only okay when I say it.
translation.zh: -太娘娘腔？ -这话只有我可以说

translation.en: Did you write this? No, I swear!
translation.zh: -是你写的吗？ -不 我可以发誓

translation.en: Then you told somebody! She told!
translation.zh: -但是你告诉别人 -她说的

translation.en: You little bitch! You're a bitch!
translation.zh: -你这小贱人 -你才是贱人

translation.en: Yeah! Take your top off!
translation.zh: 把上衣脱掉

translation.en: Now, here's what we're gonna do-- Ron, come quick!
translation.zh: -我们打算这么办… -她们抓狂了

translation.en: They've gone wild. The girls have gone wild.
translation.zh: -我们打算这么办… -她们抓狂了 那些女孩子们抓狂了

translation.en: [Cady] It was full-tilt jungle madness.
translation.zh: 简直就像一股疯狂的浪潮

translation.en: And it wasn't going away.
translation.zh: 一发不可收拾

translation.en: Hey, I pulled these two off each other. Coach Carr, step away from the underage girls.
translation.zh: -我把这两人拉开 -离未成年少女远点

translation.en: -Let me help you down there. -Whoa!
translation.zh: 我来帮你

translation.en: Hell, no! I did not leave the Southside for this!
translation.zh: 我来帮你 我不会让这所学校变成这样的

translation.en: Oh, crap! My hair!
translation.zh: 可恶 我的头发

translation.en: All junior girls report to the gymnasium immediately!
translation.zh: 所有低年级女生马上到体育馆报到

translation.en: Immediately!
translation.zh: 马上

translation.en: [Cady] Have you ever walked up to people and realized they were just talking about you?
translation.zh: 你有走过一群人 并发现他们都在谈论你…

translation.en: Have you ever had it happen 60 times in a row?
translation.zh: 而且连续高达60次的经验吗？

translation.en: -[chatter stops] -I have.
translation.zh: 我有

translation.en: Never in my 14 years as an educator have I seen such behavior.
translation.zh: 在我14年的执教生涯里 从没见过这种举动

translation.en: And from young ladies.
translation.zh: 尤其是来自一群年轻小姐

translation.en: I got parents calling me on the phone, asking, "Did someone get shot?"
translation.zh: 家长打电话来问 是不是有人被射杀了

translation.en: I ought to cancel your Spring Fling. [girls] No!
translation.zh: -我要取消春季狂欢舞会 -不

translation.en: Now, I'm not gonna do that, because we've already paid the DJ.
translation.zh: 我不会这么做 因为我们已经付钱给乐师

translation.en: But don't think that I'm not taking this book seriously.
translation.zh: 别以为我不会严办这件事

translation.en: Coach Carr has fled school property.
translation.zh: 卡尔教练已经逃离学校

translation.en: Ms. Norbury has been accused of selling drugs.
translation.zh: 诺布里太太被指控贩毒

translation.en: Now, what the young ladies in this grade need is an attitude makeover.
translation.zh: 这个年级的女学生需要道德重整

translation.en: And you're gonna get it right now.
translation.zh: 你们现在就要学

translation.en: I don't care how long it takes, I will keep you here all night.
translation.zh: 我不在乎要花多少时间 我会留你们整晚

translation.en: We can't keep them past 4:00. I will keep you here until 4:00.
translation.zh: -我们不能留她们超过四点 -我会留你们直到四点

translation.en: Now, what we're gonna try to do is fix the way you young ladies relate to each other.
translation.zh: 我们要导正你们做人处世的态度

translation.en: Okay? Lady to lady.
translation.zh: 女性间的互动

translation.en: So, who has a lady problem that they'd like to talk about?
translation.zh: 谁有关于女性的问题 想提出来讨论？

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 请说

translation.en: Somebody wrote in that book that I'm lying about being a virgin,
translation.zh: 有人写说我谎称自己是处女

translation.en: because I use super-jumbo tampons. But I can't help it if I've got a heavy flow
translation.zh: 因为我用超大号的卫生棉条 但我必须如此因为我流量很大

translation.en: and a wide-set vagina.
translation.zh: 而且阴道也很宽

translation.en: [sighs] Yeah, I can't do this. Ms. Norbury.
translation.zh: 好 这我无法处理 诺布里太太？

translation.en: You're a successful, intelligent, caring, graceful woman.
translation.zh: 你是一位成功又聪慧 体贴而优雅的女性

translation.en: I am?
translation.zh: 我是吗？

translation.en: There has to be something that you can say to these young ladies. Something to help them with their self-esteem?
translation.zh: 你一定有办法帮她们找回自尊

translation.en: [scoffs] It's not a self-esteem problem. I think they're all pretty pleased with themselves.
translation.zh: 这无关自尊 她们都对自己很满意了

translation.en: [sighs] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Okay, uh, everybody close your eyes.
translation.zh: 好 大家把眼睛闭上

translation.en: I want you to raise your hand if you have ever had a girl
translation.zh: 如果曾有人在你背后说你坏话

translation.en: say something bad about you behind your back.
translation.zh: 如果曾有人在你背后说你坏话 请把手举起来

translation.en: Open your eyes.
translation.zh: 把眼睛张开

translation.en: Now, close your eyes again. And this time,
translation.zh: 现在再把眼睛闭起来

translation.en: I want you to raise your hand if you have ever
translation.zh: 现在再把眼睛闭起来 如果你曾在朋友背后说她坏话 把手举起来

translation.en: said anything about a friend behind her back.
translation.zh: 如果你曾在朋友背后说她坏话 把手举起来

translation.en: Open them.
translation.zh: 眼睛张开

translation.en: There's been some girl-on-girl crime here.
translation.zh: 显然有不少女生为难女生的状况

translation.en: Okay. So, what we could do today is a couple exercises to help you
translation.zh: 所以我们今天要做一些练习

translation.en: express your anger in a healthy way.
translation.zh: 用健康的方式来表达你们的不满

translation.en: Let's start over here.
translation.zh: 让我们从这里开始

translation.en: [Cady] Ms. Norbury had us confront each other directly about the things that were bothering us.
translation.zh: 诺布里太太要我们直接面对面

translation.en: And it seemed like every clique had its own problems.
translation.zh: 每个团体都有它自己的问题

translation.en: You've been acting really stuck-up ever since you switched to shortfielder. And Dawn agrees with me.
translation.zh: 你换了位置后就神气活现 东也同意我的看法

translation.en: -Dawn? -Don't drag me into this, I'm pitching tomorrow.
translation.zh: -东？ -别拖我下水

translation.en: [in Vietnamese] Why are you scamming on my boyfriend?
translation.zh: 你为什么对着我男友大叫？

translation.en: [in Vietnamese] You're just jealous because guys like me better.
translation.zh: 你忌妒男生比较喜欢我

translation.en: [in Vietnamese] Nigga, please.
translation.zh: 你这德性 拜托

translation.en: Okay. Good.
translation.zh: 好…很好

translation.en: Can I just say that we don't have a clique problem at this school?
translation.zh: 我们学校里没有派系的问题

translation.en: And some of us shouldn't have to take this workshop, because some of us are just victims in this situation.
translation.zh: 有些人不应参加这集会 因为我们都是受害者

translation.en: [Ms. Norbury] That's probably true. How many of you have ever felt personally victimized by Regina George?
translation.zh: 那倒是真的 有多少人曾被瑞吉娜伤害过？

translation.en: Good. Okay, who's next? Who's next?
translation.zh: 好 下一个轮到谁？谁要出来说？

translation.en: Um, Cady. Do you have anything you wanna own up to?
translation.zh: 凯蒂 你有什么话要说吗？

translation.en: -[Cady] Yes. -No.
translation.zh: 有…没有

translation.en: You never made up a rumor about anybody?
translation.zh: 你从没造过任何人的谣？

translation.en: [Cady] Just that you sell drugs. No.
translation.zh: 只有关于你贩毒的部分…没有

translation.en: Nothing you want to apologize for?
translation.zh: 没有需要道歉的事？

translation.en: I couldn't apologize to Ms. Norbury without getting blamed for the whole Burn Book.
translation.zh: 我要道歉的事 就是关于麻辣书那部分

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: I'm really disappointed in you, Cady.
translation.zh: 我对你真的很失望 凯蒂

translation.en: Okay, so we're all here because of this book, right?
translation.zh: 我们都是因为这本书才到这里来

translation.en: Well, I don't know who wrote this book,
translation.zh: 我不知道这本书是谁写的

translation.en: but you all have got to stop calling each other sluts and whores.
translation.zh: 但你们以后 都不许再叫别人烂货或骚货

translation.en: It just makes it okay for guys to call you sluts and whores.
translation.zh: 这样会误导男生 让他们以为可以这么叫

translation.en: Who here has ever been called a slut?
translation.zh: 在场谁曾被叫过烂货

translation.en: Okay, everybody up.
translation.zh: 好 全体起立

translation.en: [Cady] Ms. Norbury had us write out apologies to people that we'd hurt in our lives.
translation.zh: 诺布里太太要我们写下 道歉的话给曾伤害过的人

translation.en: "Alyssa, I'm sorry I called you a gap-toothed bitch.
translation.zh: 阿莱莎 抱歉我曾叫你牙缝大的贱人

translation.en: It's not your fault you're so gap-toothed."
translation.zh: 就算你牙缝大也不能怪你

translation.en: "Gretchen, I'm sorry I laughed at you that time you got diarrhea at Barnes and Noble.
translation.zh: 葛瑞珍 抱歉我在你拉肚子时还嘲笑你

translation.en: And I'm sorry I told everyone about it."
translation.zh: 而且还把它大肆宣扬

translation.en: And I'm sorry for repeating it now.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉现在我又再提起一次

translation.en: Laura, I don't hate you because you're fat. You're fat because I hate you.
translation.zh: 我不会因为你肥而恨你 你会变肥是因为我恨你

translation.en: I just wish we could all get along like we used to in middle school.
translation.zh: 我希望我们能像 国中时一样重修旧好

translation.en: I wish that I could bake a cake made out of rainbows and smiles,
translation.zh: 我希望 我能用彩虹和微笑来烤个蛋糕

translation.en: and we'd all eat it and be happy.
translation.zh: 我们一起快乐的大快朵颐

translation.en: She doesn't even go here! Do you even go to this school?
translation.zh: -她甚至不是本校学生 -你是本校的学生吗？

translation.en: No. I just have a lot of feelings.
translation.zh: 不是 我只是感触良多

translation.en: Okay, go home.
translation.zh: 好 回家去吧

translation.en: Sharon, I think you're doing a great job. Thanks. I feel like I'm getting through.
translation.zh: -做得好 -我觉得好像通过一场考试

translation.en: I'm sorry that people are so jealous of me. But I can't help it that I'm popular.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉大家都在忌妒我 但谁叫我这么受欢迎呢

translation.en: Oh, my God! Oh, jeez. Okay, walk it off. Walk it off.
translation.zh: 天啊 她没事 让开

translation.en: They're okay. They're okay.
translation.zh: 她们没事了…

translation.en: [Ms. Norbury] Oh, boy. Okay, who's next? Who's next? Keep it going.
translation.zh: 好 谁是下一位？下一位 继续

translation.en: Oh, my God. It's her dream come true, diving into a big pile of girls.
translation.zh: 天啊 她的美梦成真了 混进了一堆女生之中

translation.en: Okay, yeah, I've got an apology.
translation.zh: 好 对 我必须在此致歉

translation.en: So, I have this friend who is a new student this year.
translation.zh: 我有一个朋友 她今年才刚转进来

translation.en: And I convinced her that it would be fun to mess up Regina George's life.
translation.zh: 我说服她去和瑞吉娜乔治混在一起

translation.en: So, I had her pretend to be friends with Regina, and then she would come to my house after, and we would just laugh about all the dumb stuff Regina said.
translation.zh: 她假装是瑞吉娜的朋友 并附和奉承她

translation.en: And we gave her these candy bar things that would make her gain weight,
translation.zh: 我们给她吃糖果棒让她增肥

translation.en: and we turned her best friends against her. And then, oh, yeah, Cady... You know my friend Cady.
translation.zh: 我们让她的好友背弃她 而我的朋友凯蒂

translation.en: She made out with Regina's boyfriend, -and then convinced him to break up with her. -[girls gasp]
translation.zh: 她和瑞吉娜的男友拍拖 并说服他和瑞吉娜分手

translation.en: Oh, God, and we gave you foot cream instead of face wash.
translation.zh: 我们给你的洗面乳其实是脚霜

translation.en: God! I am so sorry, Regina. Really, I don't know why I did it.
translation.zh: 抱歉 瑞吉娜 我不知道我为何要这么做

translation.en: I guess it's probably because I've got a big lesbian crush on you.
translation.zh: 我想那是因为我是女同志 并超级暗恋你的关系

translation.en: Suck on that!
translation.zh: 你满意了吧

translation.en: [girls chanting] Janis! Janis! Janis! Janis!
translation.zh: 詹妮丝…

translation.en: [Cady] Regina!
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜

translation.en: Regina, wait! I didn't mean for that to happen. To find out that everyone hates me? I don't care.
translation.zh: -等等 我没料到会变成这样 -发现每个人都恨我？

translation.en: Regina, please! Regina, stop!
translation.zh: -等等 我没料到会变成这样 -发现每个人都恨我？ -瑞吉娜 停下来 -知道其他人都怎么说你吗？

translation.en: No! Do you know what everyone says about you?
translation.zh: -瑞吉娜 停下来 -知道其他人都怎么说你吗？

translation.en: They say that you're a home-schooled jungle freak, who's a less-hot version of me.
translation.zh: 你这个在家自学的丛林怪胎 只不过是我的分身

translation.en: Yeah. So don't try to act so innocent.
translation.zh: 你这个在家自学的丛林怪胎 只不过是我的分身 别再装清纯了 少在这里惺惺作态…

translation.en: You can take that fake apology and shove it right up your hairy--
translation.zh: 别再装清纯了 少在这里惺惺作态…

translation.en: [Cady] And that's how Regina George died.
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜乔治就这么死了

translation.en: No, I'm totally kidding. But she did get hurt.
translation.zh: 我是开玩笑的 但她的确受了伤

translation.en: Some girls say they saw her head go all the way around. But that's just a rumor.
translation.zh: 有些人看到她的头滚出去 但那只是个谣传

translation.en: Some people swear they saw me push her in front of the bus. That was an even worse rumor.
translation.zh: 有些人发誓说看到我推她一把 这是更糟的传言

translation.en: Everybody done?
translation.zh: -都吃饱了吗？ -还没

translation.en: No. Mom, I didn't do it.
translation.zh: -都吃饱了吗？ -还没 -妈 不是我做的 -我不知道该相信谁了

translation.en: I don't know what to believe anymore.
translation.zh: -妈 不是我做的 -我不知道该相信谁了

translation.en: Mom, believe me. I'm your daughter.
translation.zh: 相信我 我是你女儿

translation.en: Why are my tribal vases under the sink?
translation.zh: 为什么我的部落花瓶 会在水槽底下？

translation.en: -Huh? -My tribal vases. Why were they under the sink?
translation.zh: 它们为何在水槽底下？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: This is the fertility vase of the Ndebele tribe. Does that mean anything to you?
translation.zh: 这是恩德比利族的生育花瓶 这对你没有任何意义吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.zh: 你到底是什么人？

translation.en: Great. All my friends hate me, and now my mom hates me.
translation.zh: 太好了 我所有的朋友都恨我 现在连我妈妈也恨我了

translation.en: Your mom does not hate you. She's afraid of you.
translation.zh: 你妈并不恨你 她只是…怕你

translation.en: I don't know, maybe we mainstream-schooled you too soon.
translation.zh: 不知道 也许我们让你太早回学校了

translation.en: Maybe you should come back and be home-schooled again for a while.
translation.zh: 也许你该回来 在家自学一段时间

translation.en: [sighs] No. Only thing worse than going back will be not going back.
translation.zh: 不 比回去更糟的事就是不回去

translation.en: How bad's it gonna be tomorrow?
translation.zh: 明天还能有多糟呢？

translation.en: Remember when we saw those lions fighting over the wart hog carcass?
translation.zh: 还记得我们看过 狮子在争夺疣猪尸体吗？

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm. -I'll be the wart hog.
translation.zh: 还记得我们看过 狮子在争夺疣猪尸体吗？ -我就是那头疣猪 -你不是疣猪 你是头狮子

translation.en: You're not a wart hog, you're a lion.
translation.zh: -我就是那头疣猪 -你不是疣猪 你是头狮子

translation.en: Just focus on your studies for a little while. You're still an excellent student, right?
translation.zh: 把心思放在功课上一段时间 你还是一位优等生吧

translation.en: Oh, yeah. I need you to sign my calculus test.
translation.zh: 对了 你要在我的数学考卷上签名

translation.en: Why? I'm failing.
translation.zh: -为什么？ -我不及格

translation.en: Okay. You are... What do they call it?
translation.zh: 凯蒂 你被…怎么说来着？

translation.en: Grounded.
translation.zh: 禁足

translation.en: You're grounded.
translation.zh: 你被禁足了

translation.en: [girl 1] She pushed her in front of the bus. [girl 2] Did you see her do it?
translation.zh: -她把她推向公车 -你看到她这么做了？

translation.en: [girl 1] Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Did your teacher ever try to sell you marijuana or Ecstasy tablets?
translation.zh: 你的老师曾向你兜售大麻 或迷幻药吗？

translation.en: [boy 1] No. [boy 2] What are marijuana tablets?
translation.zh: -没有 -大麻锭是什么？

translation.en: What's going on? Where's Ms. Norbury?
translation.zh: -没有 -大麻锭是什么？ -诺布里太太去哪里了？ -这太荒谬了

translation.en: Mr. Duvall, this is ridiculous.
translation.zh: -诺布里太太去哪里了？ -这太荒谬了

translation.en: Ms. Norbury does not sell drugs. I know, Aaron.
translation.zh: -诺布里太太没有贩毒 -我知道

translation.en: But after the allegations against Coach Carr turned out to be extremely true,
translation.zh: 但继对卡尔教练的指控 被查出属实之后

translation.en: the school board felt that it was best that we investigate every claim made in this, uh, Burn Book.
translation.zh: 校方认为最好查清楚 麻辣书里面的所有指控

translation.en: That book was written by a bunch of stupid girls who make up rumors because they're bored with their own lame lives.
translation.zh: 那本书是一些 穷极无聊的女生随便编造的

translation.en: Well, unless someone wants to come forward and say, "I made it all up," this is how we have to handle it.
translation.zh: 除非有人承认那是虚构的 否则我们还是得查下去

translation.en: [Cady] Oh, no. Bye, Aaron. You're gonna hate me forever.
translation.zh: 再见了 艾朗 你会恨我一辈子的

translation.en: Mr. Duvall. I wrote it.
translation.zh: 杜佛先生 那是我写的

translation.en: Come on, Cady.
translation.zh: 过来 凯蒂

translation.en: [Cady] When you get bit by a snake, you're supposed to suck the poison out.
translation.zh: 当你被蛇咬到时 一定要马上吸出毒液

translation.en: That's what I had to do, suck all the poison out of my life.
translation.zh: 这正是我必须做的 把毒液吸出我的生活

translation.en: I started with Regina, who was living proof
translation.zh: 就从瑞吉娜开始 她是个活生生的例子

translation.en: that the more people are scared of you, the more flowers you get.
translation.zh: 说明会吵的人有糖吃

translation.en: Then there was Ms. Norbury,
translation.zh: 诺布里太太是另一个活生生的案例

translation.en: who was living proof that no good deed goes unpunished.
translation.zh: 诺布里太太是另一个活生生的案例 证明好心没好报

translation.en: Oh, hi. Did you wanna buy some drugs? I'm just done with my quiz.
translation.zh: -你要买毒品吗？ -我刚做完测验

translation.en: Wait. I'll grade it right now.
translation.zh: 我马上批改

translation.en: I gotta say, watching the police search my house really was the cherry on top of a fantastic year.
translation.zh: 看着警察来搜我的房子 真是年度一大乐事

translation.en: How much trouble did you get in for telling the truth?
translation.zh: 你说出实话之后 对你造成多大的困扰？

translation.en: A lot.
translation.zh: 很大

translation.en: You didn't write that whole book yourself. Did you tell Mr. Duvall who else did it?
translation.zh: 那本书不是你亲手写的 你有没有说出是谁写的？

translation.en: No, because I'm trying this new thing where I don't talk about people behind their backs.
translation.zh: 没有 我尽量不要 在别人背后说他们的坏话

translation.en: That's all right. Getting hit by a bus is pretty good punishment. Ninety-four.
translation.zh: -被车撞就是受到惩罚了 -94分

translation.en: Welcome back, nerd. Thanks.
translation.zh: -欢迎归队 天才 -谢谢

translation.en: Anyway, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 总之…我很抱歉

translation.en: I forgive you.
translation.zh: 我原谅你

translation.en: But as my own personal form of punishment,
translation.zh: 但就我个人对你的惩罚

translation.en: I figured out how you're gonna earn that extra credit.
translation.zh: 我倒要看看你要怎么表现

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: ♪ If God is a DJ Life is a dance floor ♪
translation.zh: （数学竞赛）

translation.en: Excellent. Great turnout this year.
translation.zh: 太好了 今年的出席率不错

translation.en: -All right. It's all you. -Okay. -Make me look good out there. -Okay.
translation.zh: 好 全靠你们了 别让我丢脸

translation.en: Marymount, you sons of bitches. You no-good sons of bitches.
translation.zh: 玛丽蒙特 我们走着瞧

translation.en: You nervous? Yes.
translation.zh: -会紧张吗？ -对

translation.en: Don't be. You can do this. There's nothing to break your focus,
translation.zh: 别紧张 没什么好分心的

translation.en: because not one of those Marymount boys is cute.
translation.zh: 玛丽蒙特高中的男生没一个好看的

translation.en: [host] Good evening, ladies and gentlemen. Welcome to the Illinois High School Mathletes State Championship.
translation.zh: 晚安 欢迎参加伊利诺州 数学竞赛州际冠军赛

translation.en: Let's start the competition. Here is the first question.
translation.zh: 现在开始 第一题

translation.en: Twice the larger of two numbers is three more than five times
translation.zh: 有两个数字 大数乘以2减小数乘以5等于3

translation.en: the smaller, and the sum of four times the larger
translation.zh: 有两个数字 大数乘以2减小数乘以5等于3 大数乘以4加小数乘以3等于71 这两个数字是…

translation.en: and three times the smaller is 71. -What are-- -[buzzer]
translation.zh: 大数乘以4加小数乘以3等于71 这两个数字是…

translation.en: -North Shore? -Fourteen and five.
translation.zh: -北岸高中 -14和5

translation.en: That is correct. Question number two.
translation.zh: 答对了

translation.en: Find an odd three-digit number whose digits add up to 12.
translation.zh: 一个三位数的奇数 每位数相加总和是12

translation.en: The digits are all different, and the difference between the first two digits -equals the difference between-- -[buzzer]
translation.zh: 每位数皆不相同 前两位数的差…

translation.en: Marymount?
translation.zh: -玛丽蒙特高中 -741

translation.en: -Seven hundred and forty one. -Correct.
translation.zh: -玛丽蒙特高中 -741 -答对了 -可恶 我真是逊毙了

translation.en: [Cady] Shoot. I was really rusty.
translation.zh: -答对了 -可恶 我真是逊毙了

translation.en: Where's Cady? She went out.
translation.zh: -凯蒂在哪里？ -她出去了

translation.en: She's grounded.
translation.zh: 她被禁足了

translation.en: Are they not allowed out when they're grounded?
translation.zh: 被禁足的人不能外出吗？

translation.en: Don't forget to vote for Spring Fling King and Queen, people.
translation.zh: 别忘了投票选出 春季狂欢的国王和皇后

translation.en: These A-holes will represent you for a full calendar year.
translation.zh: 他们会代表你一整年

translation.en: I'm gonna vote for Regina George because she got hit by that bus.
translation.zh: 我会投瑞吉娜 因为她被车撞了

translation.en: I'm voting for Cady Heron because she pushed her.
translation.zh: 我要投凯蒂 因为她推了瑞吉娜一把

translation.en: She's supposed to be grounded, but he let her out.
translation.zh: 她本该被禁足的 但他让她出门了

translation.en: After 87 minutes of very competitive play, we have a tie.
translation.zh: 在87分钟的激烈竞争后 双方打成平手

translation.en: In the event of a tie, we move into a sudden-death round.
translation.zh: 所以我们将进入骤死赛回合

translation.en: Each team is given the opportunity to choose their opponent.
translation.zh: 每一队各有一个机会 选择他们的对手

translation.en: North Shore, who do you select? The girl, dude. The girl.
translation.zh: -北岸高中 你们要选谁？ -那个女生

translation.en: Contestant Krafft. [host] From Marymount, Miss Caroline Krafft.
translation.zh: -卡洛琳克雷夫特 -克雷夫特代表玛丽蒙特

translation.en: We pick the girl, too. And from North Shore, Miss Caddy Heron.
translation.zh: -我们也要选那个女孩 -甘蒂哈朗代表北岸

translation.en: It's Cady.
translation.zh: 是凯蒂

translation.en: Oh, my God, that's me.
translation.zh: 天啊 是我

translation.en: [Cady] Miss Caroline Krafft seriously needed to pluck her eyebrows.
translation.zh: 卡洛琳克雷夫特的眉毛 需要好好修一修

translation.en: Her outfit looked like it was picked out by a blind Sunday school teacher.
translation.zh: 她的穿着简直保守到不行

translation.en: And she had some 99-cent lip gloss on her snaggletooth.
translation.zh: 她用的是便宜的亮光唇膏

translation.en: And that's when I realized, making fun of Caroline Krafft wouldn't stop her from beating me in this contest.
translation.zh: 但嘲笑她并不表示她不会击败我

translation.en: Contestants, find the limit of this equation.
translation.zh: 两位参赛者 请找出这个方程式的极限

translation.en: Calling somebody else fat won't make you any skinnier.
translation.zh: 说别人胖也不会使自己更苗条

translation.en: Calling someone stupid doesn't make you any smarter.
translation.zh: 骂别人笨也不会使自己更聪明

translation.en: And ruining Regina George's life definitely didn't make me any happier.
translation.zh: 毁了瑞吉娜并不会使我更快乐

translation.en: All you can do in life is try to solve the problem in front of you.
translation.zh: 在生活中你所能做的 只是解决眼前的问题

translation.en: The limit is negative one. [Cady] Oh, crap. I lost.
translation.zh: -极限是负一 -糟 我输了

translation.en: -That answer is incorrect. -[teammates groan]
translation.zh: 答错了 这是骤死赛

translation.en: Now, we are in a sudden death. If Miss Heron can answer
translation.zh: 答错了 这是骤死赛 如果哈朗小姐答对的话 胜负马上有分晓

translation.en: this problem correctly, we have a winner.
translation.zh: 如果哈朗小姐答对的话 胜负马上有分晓

translation.en: [Cady] Limits. Why couldn't I remember anything about limits?
translation.zh: 极限…我怎么想不起极限的事

translation.en: Limits. That was the week Aaron got his hair cut.
translation.zh: 那个星期艾朗去剪了头发 真可爱

translation.en: Oh, God, he looked so cute. Okay, focus, Cady.
translation.zh: 那个星期艾朗去剪了头发 真可爱 集中精神 凯蒂 艾朗后面的黑板上写了什么

translation.en: What was on the board behind Aaron's head?
translation.zh: 集中精神 凯蒂 艾朗后面的黑板上写了什么

translation.en: If the limit never approaches anything...
translation.zh: 如果极限不趋近于任何数

translation.en: The limit does not exist. The limit does not exist!
translation.zh: 那极限就不存在

translation.en: Our new state champions, the North Shore Mathletes.
translation.zh: 我们的新州际冠军是北岸高中

translation.en: How do you like me now? You like that? Yeah! Get some! Get some!
translation.zh: 你们想怎么样？ 这个如何？好好享受吧

translation.en: [boy] Awesome. You went with the leather sleeves. Africa, you did the damn thing.
translation.zh: -太棒了 还是皮袖子 -非洲女 你表现得很好

translation.en: Aw, thanks, K.G.
translation.zh: 谢了 凯文

translation.en: We're gonna look so kick-ass in these when we roll into Spring Fling.
translation.zh: -我们会在舞会上大出风头 -我不去狂欢舞会

translation.en: -Oh, no, I'm not going. -What?
translation.zh: -我们会在舞会上大出风头 -我不去狂欢舞会 -什么？ -这是你的舞会 别受景响

translation.en: Cady, this is your night. Don't let the haters stop you from doing your thang.
translation.zh: -什么？ -这是你的舞会 别受景响

translation.en: Did you just say "thang"? Cady, you don't have to punish yourself forever.
translation.zh: -你刚才是说“景响”吗？ -不需要一辈子自责

translation.en: But I'm grounded. You're already out.
translation.zh: -但我被禁足了 -你已经出来了

translation.en: All right, do we have all of our nominees for king and queen on the stage?
translation.zh: 所有国王和皇后的候选人 都站在台上了吗？

translation.en: Okay, good. I just wanted to say that you're all winners.
translation.zh: 好 我只想说 你们都是赢家

translation.en: And I could not be happier that this school year's ending.
translation.zh: 真高兴这个学年终于要结束了

translation.en: Here we go. The winner of the Spring Fling King,
translation.zh: 现在宣布 春季狂欢的国王是…

translation.en: Shane Oman. Yes! Whoo! That's what I'm talking about!
translation.zh: -尚恩欧曼 -太棒了 实至名归

translation.en: [Mr. Duvall] And your Spring Fling Queen,
translation.zh: 而春季狂欢皇后

translation.en: future co-chair of the Student Activities Board
translation.zh: 未来一年学生活动的领导者

translation.en: and winner of two gift certificates to the Walker Brothers Pancake House,
translation.zh: 而且她可以赢得两张 沃克兄弟煎饼屋的招待券

translation.en: Cady Heron.
translation.zh: 凯蒂哈朗

translation.en: Where is Cady?
translation.zh: 凯蒂在哪里？

translation.en: There she is.
translation.zh: 她在那里

translation.en: Wow. Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Well, half the people in this room are mad at me.
translation.zh: 这屋里有一半的人恨我

translation.en: And the other half only like me
translation.zh: 这屋里有一半的人恨我 另一半的人喜欢我是因为…

translation.en: because they think I pushed somebody in front of a bus.
translation.zh: 另一半的人喜欢我是因为… 他们以为我把某人推向公车 因此这不是好事

translation.en: So, that's not good.
translation.zh: 他们以为我把某人推向公车 因此这不是好事

translation.en: You know, it's not really required of you to make a speech.
translation.zh: 你不需要发表感言

translation.en: I'm almost done, I swear.
translation.zh: 我快说完了

translation.en: To, uh, all the people whose feelings that got hurt by the Burn Book,
translation.zh: 对那些被麻辣书中伤过的人

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 我由衷的道歉

translation.en: You know, I've never been to one of these things before.
translation.zh: 我之前从没经历过这类事情

translation.en: And when I think about how many people wanted this,
translation.zh: 当我想到有多少人想得到这个

translation.en: and how many people cried over it and stuff...
translation.zh: 有多少人为它追胸顿足

translation.en: I mean, I think everybody looks like royalty tonight.
translation.zh: 我认为每个人 都是今晚的国王和皇后

translation.en: Look at Jessica Lopez. That dress is amazing.
translation.zh: 看看洁西卡罗培兹 她的衣服好美

translation.en: And Emma Gerber, I mean, that hairdo must have taken hours, and you look really pretty.
translation.zh: 艾玛葛柏的发型 一定费了一番功夫 真漂亮

translation.en: So... why is everybody stressing over this thing?
translation.zh: 所以大家何必只在意这个呢

translation.en: I mean, it's just plastic. Could really just...
translation.zh: 这只是个塑胶制品

translation.en: ...share it.
translation.zh: 我愿和大家分享

translation.en: A piece for Gretchen Wieners, a partial Spring Fling Queen.
translation.zh: 一片给葛瑞珍温纳 她也是春季狂欢皇后

translation.en: A piece for Janis Ian.
translation.zh: 一片给詹妮丝伊恩

translation.en: Seriously, most people just take the crown and go.
translation.zh: 我说真的 很多人只是拿了后冠就走

translation.en: And a piece for Regina George.
translation.zh: 一片给瑞吉娜

translation.en: She fractured her spine, and she still looks like a rock star.
translation.zh: 她虽脊椎骨折 但仍有摇滚巨星风范

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: And some for everybody else.
translation.zh: 这几片跟大家分享

translation.en: God, Mr. Duvall, can you wrap it up? Thanks.
translation.zh: -杜佛先生 交给你了 -谢谢

translation.en: All right, have a good time, everyone.
translation.zh: 好 各位尽情狂欢吧

translation.en: Look. I'm a queen. As am I.
translation.zh: -你看 我是皇后 -我也是

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh: -你好 -你好

translation.en: So, are we still in a fight? Are you still an asshole?
translation.zh: -我们还在冷战吗？ -你还是那么讨人厌吗？

translation.en: Mmm, I don't think so. Well, then I guess we're okay.
translation.zh: -我不这么认为 -那我们就和好了

translation.en: Oh, my God, I love this song! I hate this song.
translation.zh: -天啊 我好爱这首歌 -我讨厌这首歌

translation.en: I know this song!
translation.zh: 我听过这首歌

translation.en: Um, man candy, stage right.
translation.zh: 凯蒂 在你右边

translation.en: Hey, what's up? Hey. Didn't think you'd make it.
translation.zh: -你好 -没想到你选上了

translation.en: Oh, um, on behalf of the senior class, I would like to present you with two gift certificates--
translation.zh: 我代表毕业班送给你…

translation.en: -Thanks, sucker. -Yo, peace.
translation.zh: -谢了 -和平共处

translation.en: One gift certificate to the Walker Brothers Pancake House.
translation.zh: 一张沃克兄弟煎饼屋的招待券

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Congratulations on winning State.
translation.zh: 恭喜你赢得州际冠军

translation.en: I was so nervous. They made us do limits. I thought I was gonna hurl.
translation.zh: 我紧张到差点失控

translation.en: How's your stomach now? It's fine.
translation.zh: -你的胃现在如何？ -没事了

translation.en: Do you feel nauseous at all? No.
translation.zh: -你现在会想吐吗？ -不会

translation.en: -Have you been drinking? -No.
translation.zh: -你之前喝过酒吗？ -没有

translation.en: Okay. Grool.
translation.zh: 好酷

translation.en: -No. -No.
translation.zh: -好恶心 -不行

translation.en: What's up? Can I help you?
translation.zh: -你好 -有什么事？

translation.en: You Puerto Rican? Lebanese.
translation.zh: -你是波多黎各人？ -黎巴嫩人

translation.en: I feel that.
translation.zh: 可以感觉得出来

translation.en: [Cady] In case you're wondering, The Plastics broke up.
translation.zh: 跟各位报告一下 塑胶一族解散了

translation.en: Regina's spine healed, and her physical therapist taught her to channel all her rage into sports.
translation.zh: 瑞吉娜治好了脊椎 并转往体育方面发展

translation.en: [Cady] It was perfect, because the jock girls weren't afraid of her.
translation.zh: 情况乐观 因为那些运动女将根本不怕她

translation.en: Karen used her special talents to do the morning weather announcements.
translation.zh: 凯伦运用她的天赋 担任天气预测的工作

translation.en: Hi. This is Karen Smith. It's 68 degrees,
translation.zh: 你好 我是凯伦史密斯 今天是华氏68度

translation.en: and there's a 30% chance that it's already raining.
translation.zh: 有30%正在降雨的机率

translation.en: [Cady] And Gretchen found herself a new clique and a new queen bee to serve.
translation.zh: 葛瑞珍加入了一个新派系 追随另一个新女王蜂

translation.en: [Cady] Aaron went to Northwestern, so I still get to see him on weekends.
translation.zh: 艾朗去了西北大学 所以我只有在周末才见得到他

translation.en: And me?
translation.zh: 至于我？

translation.en: I had gone from home-schooled jungle freak, to shiny Plastic, to most hated person in the world,
translation.zh: 从在家自学的怪胎 到人见人恨的塑胶一族

translation.en: to actual human being.
translation.zh: 现在又恢复成正常人了

translation.en: All the drama from last year just wasn't important anymore.
translation.zh: 去年所发生的一切都不再重要

translation.en: School used to be like a shark tank, but now I could just float.
translation.zh: 学校本来就像个鲨鱼槽 但现在我知道如何求生存

translation.en: Finally, Girl World was at peace.
translation.zh: 最后 女人世界终于恢复了宁静

translation.en: Hey, check it out. Junior Plastics.
translation.zh: 你们看 幼齿塑胶一族

translation.en: [Cady] And if any freshmen tried to disturb that peace...
translation.zh: 如有任何新人想搅乱这场宁静

translation.en: Well, let's just say we knew how to take care of it.
translation.zh: 我相信我们也有办法对付

translation.en: Just kidding.
translation.zh: 我是开玩笑的
